fields.definition: "Average weight of dehulled grains per panicle." [GR:pj]

fields.name: large vascular bundle number to spikelet number ratio
fields.definition: "A ratio of number of large vascular bundles present in the spikelets to the number of spikelets in a grass inflorescence." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf area to spikelet number ratio
fields.definition: "A ratio of leaf area to the number of spikelets in a grass inflorescence." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Often measured using the flag leaf.

fields.name: panicle to tiller ratio
fields.definition: "A ratio of number of tiller bearing the panicles to the total number of tillers in rice." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Not all the tillers bear panicle.

fields.name: stem borer resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agents: Chilo suppressalis (striped), C. polychrysus (dark headed), Rupela albinella (South American white), Scirpophaga incertulas (yellow), S innotata (white), Sesamia inferens (pink), Maliarpha separatella (african whiteheads), Diopsis macrophthalma (stalked-eyed fly), and several other species." [GR:pj, ICIS:1164, IRRI:SES]

fields.name: seed set percent
fields.definition: "An infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000920) which is the percent of seeds (PO:0009010) set in an infructescence (PO:0006342)." []

fields.name: spikelet number
fields.definition: "A spikelet morphology trait (TO:0000657) which is the average number of spikelets (PO:0009051) in one or more inflorescence (PO:0009049) (e.g. rice panicle) found in a plant or on all plants of a study." [GR:pj, PO:0009049, PO:0009051, TO:moorel]

fields.name: drought recovery
fields.definition: "Scores are taken after 10 days following soaking rain or watering- Indicate the degree of stress before recovery." [IRRI:SES]

fields.name: root epidermis cell length
fields.definition: "Length of the root epidermal cell length." [GR:pj37]

fields.name: gelatinization temperature
fields.definition: "Is an indication of gelatinization temperature. Observed by placing six milled-grains/kernels in 10ml 1.7% KOH in a shallow container and arrange them so that they do not touch. Let them stand for 23hrs at 30C temperature and score for spreading. Measure for Alkali digestion is inversely proportional to the gelatinization temperature, e.g. if alkali digestion is low, the gelatinization temperature is high." [GR:pj, ICIS:1256, IRRI:SES]

fields.name: anthesis silking interval
fields.definition: "A difference of the average number of days between the maize tassel flowering and the first visible silk (stigma) on the maize ear." [GR:pj]

fields.name: mineral and ion content related trait
fields.definition: "A biochemical trait (TO:0000277) that is the amount of a particular mineral or ion constituent occurring in a plant anatomical entity (PO:0025131)." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: May be measured in a dry mass or in a fresh tissue.

fields.name: carbon content
fields.definition: "Amount of carbon present in the dry mass." [GR:pj]

fields.name: cell membrane stability
fields.definition: "Stability of the cell membrane under the impact of temperature (heat) and water deficit stress." [GR:pj, web:http\://www.plantstress.com/methods/CMS_method.htm]
fields.comment: The trait is often observed in plants as a measure of drought and heat tolerance by determining the amount of solutes/electrolyte leaked from the cell.

fields.name: leaf blast disease resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Magnaporthe grisea. Symptoms: Can affect either or both the leaf and panicles." [GR:pj, IRRI:SES]

fields.name: days to maturity
fields.definition: "Number of days required from seeding to seed/grain ripening ." [ICIS:1012, IRRI:SES]

fields.name: vascular tissue morphology trait
fields.definition: "A portion of plant tissue morphology trait (TO:0000843) which is a quality of a vascular tissue and its parts." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]

fields.name: root penetration index
fields.definition: "Its the fraction of number of penetrated roots over the total number of roots." [GR:jcl, GR:pj]

fields.name: vascular bundle number
fields.definition: "Number of vascular bundles present in a plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: grain shattering
fields.definition: "Measurement of extent of grain shattering, which depends on development of abscission zone. This trait often refers to shattering or the premature or ease of shedding of the grass fruit called caryopsis from the inflorescence." [GR:pj]

fields.name: glume opening
fields.definition: "Angle of opening of glumes is measured on each floret, assessment based on mean angle of glume opening." [GR:pj, IRRI:SES]

fields.name: growth hormone content
fields.definition: "A metabolite content trait (TO:0000281) which is the amount of plant hormone (CHEBI:37848) in a plant structure (PO:0009011)." [GR:pj]

fields.name: panicle blast disease resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Magnaporthe grisea (Pyricularia oryzae). Symptoms are dark necrotic lesions covering partially or completely around the panicle base (node) or the uppermost internode or the lower part." [GR:pj, ICIS:1119, IRRI:SES]

fields.name: abscisic acid concentration
fields.definition: "Measures the growth hormone concentration in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: acid sensitivity
fields.definition: "Plant sensitivity to an acidic (pH<7) growth media." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]

fields.name: nutrient sensitivity
fields.definition: "A growth media composition sensitivity (TO:0000238) which is the plant's response to an excess or deficient amount of the macro or micronutrient in the growth medium (soil/culture media)." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]

fields.name: alkali sensitivity
fields.definition: "Plant sensitivity to an alkali (pH>7) growth media." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]

fields.name: chemical stress sensitivity
fields.definition: "Response by the plant in terms of resistivity or senility to chemical stress." [GR:pj]

fields.name: germinability at low temperature
fields.definition: "Measure of the seed's germination ability at sub-permissive temperature levels." [GR:pj]

fields.name: seed shape
fields.definition: "A seed morphology trait (TO:0000184) which is the shape of a seed (PO:0009010)." [GR:pj, PO:0009010, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Seed shape can be a component of seed quality (TO:0000162). Refers to shape (PATO:0000052): A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's ratios of distances between its features (points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc).

fields.name: seed color
fields.definition: "A seed morphology trait (TO:0000184) which is the color of a seed (PO:0009010)." [GR:pj, PO:0009019, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color (PATO:0000014): A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts. In a seed this can be measured on the seed coat or the inside parts of a seed.

fields.name: endosperm color
fields.definition: "An endosperm morphology trait (TO:0000575) which is the color of an endosperm (PO:0009089)." [GR:pj, PO:0009089, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color PATO:0000014: A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: seed protein composition trait
fields.definition: "A seed composition based quality trait (TO:0000488) which is the amount of protein (CHEBI_36080) in a seed (PO:0009010)." []

fields.name: fat and essential oil composition related trait
leaf shape
fields.definition: "A leaf morphology trait (TO:0000748) which is the variation in shapes and forms of a leaf (PO:0025034)." [GR:pj, PO:0025034, TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refer to shape (PATO:0000052): A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's ratios of distances between its features (points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc).  If you are annotating to this term, please add an additional annotation to vascular leaf morphology (TO:0000419) or non-vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000925), depending on the species.

fields.name: leaf composition trait
fields.definition: "A leaf morphology trait (TO:0000748) which is the composition of a leaf (PO:0025034)." [PO:0025034, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: If you are annotating to this term, please add an additional annotation to vascular leaf morphology (TO:0000419) or non-vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000925), depending on the species.

fields.name: chlorophyll content
fields.definition: "Measures the chlorophyll content in a green tissue. Includes both chlorophyll-a and chlorophyll-b. Chlorophyll is the green pigment found in plants." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Chlorophyll is the principal photoreceptor in photosynthesis, the light-driven process in which carbon dioxide is fixed to yield carbohydrates and oxygen. Chlorophyll is a cyclic tetrapyrolle, similar in structure to the heme group of globins (hemoglobin, myoglobin) and cytochromes. Chlorophyll differs from heme in a few major respects, most notably that the central metal ion in chlorophyll is magnesium while that in heme is iron.

fields.name: carotenoid content
fields.definition: "The carotenoid content in a plant or plant part. Includes naturally occurring tetra terpenes that are synthesized only in plants." []

fields.name: female fertility restoration trait
fields.definition: "Describes the extent of female fertility restoration in terms of percent seed set." [GR:pj]

fields.name: flower morphology trait
fields.definition: "A reproductive shoot system morphology trait (TO:0000786) which is a quality of a  flower (PO:0009046)." [GR:pj, PO:0009046, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: spikelet weight
fields.definition: "A spikelet morphology trait (TO:0000657) which is the weight of a spikelet (PO:0009051)." [GR:pj, PO:0009051, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to weight (PATO:0000128): A physical quality inhering in a bearer that has mass near a gravitational body.

fields.name: potassium chlorate resistance
fields.definition: "Resistance to the KClO3 salt content in the growth medium." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf rolling time
fields.definition: "A leaf rolling trait (TO:0000085) which is the measure of  time taken by the leaf to roll completely under drought or water stress." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]

fields.name: leaf temperature
fields.definition: "A leaf morphology trait (TO:0000748) which is the leaf surface temperature." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: If you are annotating to this term, please add an additional annotation to vascular leaf morphology (TO:0000419) or non-vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000925), depending on the species.

fields.name: leaf weight
fields.definition: "A leaf morphology trait (TO:0000505) which is the weight of a leaf (PO:0025034)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: If you are annotating to this term, please add an additional annotation to vascular leaf morphology (TO:0000419) or non-vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000925), depending on the species.

fields.name: nitrogen recycling
fields.definition: "It is a measure of reduced net ammonium production in response to the receipt of photosynthate." [GR:pj]

fields.name: osmotic adjustment capacity
fields.definition: "The ability of the plant to adust the osmotic potential under stress conditions." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: The main role of osmotic adjustment in the plant is to assist in the maintenance of turgor and volume as organs lose water during desiccation, i.e. to provide dehydration tolerance. Often determined by relative water or the amount of solute accumulated at a given water potential.

fields.name: penetrated root length
fields.definition: "Average maximum length of the root of a plant in a study that have penetrated to a predetermined soil depth." [GR:pj]

fields.name: penetrated to total root ratio
fields.definition: "A ratio of penetrated to total number of roots in a plant." [GR:pj]

fields.name: phosphorus uptake
fields.definition: "The total phosphorus ion uptake measured in a plant or a plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: plant survival percentage under submergence
fields.definition: "Percent of plants survived under submerged conditions." [GR:pj]

fields.name: potassium concentration
fields.definition: "The total potassium ion concentration measured in a plant or a plant part or plant extract." [GR:pj]

fields.name: potassium uptake
fields.definition: "The total potassium ion uptake measured in a plant or a plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: relative growth rate
fields.definition: "The relative growth of the plant determined after a given treatment as compared to the one determined under normal conditions." [GR:pj]

fields.name: relative root length
fields.definition: "The relative length of the root determined after a given treatment as compared to the one determined under normal conditions." [GR:pj]

fields.name: relative shoot elongation under submergence
fields.definition: "Elongation of the shoot under submergence condition against a reference without submergence." [GR:pj]

fields.name: rooting depth
fields.definition: "It is calculated from the deepest soil layer where roots were present and the longest root measured in the layer." [GR:pj, PMID:12582650]

fields.name: stomatal closure rate
fields.definition: "The rate of closure of stomata due to stress or coupled to the rate of photosynthesis and/or transpiration." [GR:pj]

fields.name: stomatal closure time
fields.definition: "Average time taken for closure of stomata due to stress or coupled to the rate of photosynthesis and/or transpiration." [GR:pj]

fields.name: stomatal conductance
fields.definition: "It is a numerical measure of the maximum rate of passage of either water vapour or carbon dioxide through the stomata." [GR:pj, Wikipedia:Stomatal_conductance]

fields.name: stomatal resistance
fields.definition: "Stomatal resistance (or its inverse, stomatal conductance) can therefore be calculated from the transpiration rate and humidity gradient. (The humidity gradient is the humidity inside the leaf, determined from leaf temperature based on the assumption that the leaf's air spaces are saturated with vapor, minus the humidity of the ambient air, which is measured directly)." [Wikipedia:Stomatal_conductance]
fields.comment: This allows scientists to learn how stomata respond to changes in environmental conditions, such as light intensity, humidity, or carbon dioxide concentration.

fields.name: sodium to potassium content ratio
fields.definition: "The ratio of total sodium to potassium ion content measured in a plant or a plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: sodium concentration
fields.definition: "The total sodium ion concentration measured in a given volume of a plant or a plant part or plant extract." [GR:pj]

fields.name: sodium uptake
fields.definition: "The total sodium ion uptake measured in a plant or a plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: abaxial stomatal frequency
fields.definition: "Number of stomata present on the abaxial surface of leaf." [GR:pj]

fields.name: adaxial stomatal frequency
fields.definition: "Number of stomata present on the adaxial surface of leaf." [GR:pj]

fields.name: anther length
fields.definition: "An anther morphology trait (TO:1000022) which is the length (PATO:0000122) of an anther (PO:0009066)." [TO:ethan_johnson\nTO\:austin_meier]
fields.comment: Refers to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: apiculus hair length
fields.definition: "Length of the apiculus hair." [GR:pj]

fields.name: culm color
fields.definition: "Variation in the color of the culm of a grass plant." [GR:pj]

fields.name: floret color
fields.definition: "A floret morphology trait (TO:0000274) which is the color of the floret." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Refer to color (PATO:0000014): A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: flower color
fields.definition: "A flower morphology trait (TO:0000499) which is the color of the flower (PO:0009046)." [GR:pj, PO:0009046, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color (PATO:0000014): A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: large vascular bundle number to leaf area ratio
fields.definition: "A ratio of the large sized vascular bundles to the leaf surface area." [GR:pj]

fields.name: large vascular bundle number
fields.definition: "Number of the large sized vascular bundles." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf area trait
fields.definition: "A leaf morphology trait (TO:0000748) which is the total area of a leaf (PO:0025034)." [GR:pj, PO:0025034, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refer to area (PATO:0001323): A 2-D extent quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's two dimensional extent. If you are annotating to this term, please add an additional annotation to vascular leaf morphology (TO:0000419) or non-vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000925), depending on the species.

fields.name: leaf position
fields.definition: "A leaf morphology trait (TO:0000748) which is the position of the leaf (PO:0025034) on the plant." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to: position (PATO_0000140): A spatial quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's spatial location relative to other objects in the vicinity. Usually measured from the ground.  If you are annotating to this term, please add an additional annotation to vascular leaf morphology (TO:0000419) or non-vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000925), depending on the species.

fields.name: leaf length to width ratio
fields.definition: "A leaf size (TO:0002637) which is the ratio of leaf length to its width." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: If you are annotating to this term, please add an additional annotation to vascular leaf morphology (TO:0000419) or non-vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000925), depending on the species.

fields.name: leaf nitrogen content
fields.definition: "A leaf composition trait (TO:0000493) which is the amount of nitrogen (CHEBI:51143) in the leaf (PO:0025034)." [CHEBI:51143]

fields.name: mesocotyl length
fields.definition: "A mesocotyl morphology trait (TO:0000758) which is the length of a mesocotyl (PO:0020037)." [GR:pj, PO:0020037, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: panicle base to lowest branch
fields.definition: "A panicle morphology trait (TO:0000847) which is the length of the region between the panicle base to the lowest (the first)  primary panicle branch." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length PATO:0000122: A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: peduncle top diameter
fields.definition: "A peduncle morphology trait (TO:0000776) which is the diameter at the tip of the peduncle (PO:0009053)." [GR:pj, PO:0009053, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to the diameter ((PATO:0001334): A length quality which is equal to the length of any straight line segment that passes through the center of a circle and whose endpoints are on the circular boundary) of the tip of a peduncle (PO:0009053).

fields.name: primary branch number
fields.definition: "A primary branch of inflorescence (TO:0000052) trait which is the number of primary branches present in the inflorescence (PO:0009049)." [GR:pj, PO:0009049, TO:moorel]

fields.name: rhizome number
fields.definition: "Number of rhizomes present in a plant." [GR:pj]

fields.name: rhizome morphology trait
fields.definition: "A trait which is a quality of of the rhizomatic stem and its parts." [GR:pj]

fields.name: rhizome branching angle
fields.definition: "Angle of branches on a rhizhomatic stem." [GR:pj]

fields.name: rhizome branching number
fields.definition: "Number of branches on a rhizhomatic stem." [GR:pj]

fields.name: shoot dry weight
fields.definition: "The dry weight of the shoot without inflorescence." [GR:pj37]

fields.name: rhizome length
fields.definition: "Length of the rhizhomatic stem." [GR:pj]

fields.name: rhizome internode length
fields.definition: "Length of internodes on a rhizhomatic stem." [GR:pj]

fields.name: rhizome internode number
fields.definition: "Number of internodes on a rhizhomatic stem." [GR:pj]

fields.name: secondary branch number
fields.definition: "A secondary branching of inflorescence (TO:0000142) trait which is the number of secondary branches in an inflorescence (PO:0009049)." [GR:pj, PO:0009049, TO:moorel]

fields.name: small vascular bundle number
fields.definition: "Number of small sized vascular bundles present in a plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: plant volume
fields.definition: "Space occupied by the plant." [GR:pj]

fields.name: space per culm
fields.definition: "Space occupied by each culm or the tiller in a plant." [GR:pj]

fields.name: space to culm ratio
fields.definition: "A ratio of total space or volume occupied by the whole plant to the total number of culms or tiller in the plant." [GR:pj]

fields.name: specific leaf area
fields.definition: "A leaf area trait (TO:0000540) that is the ratio of the leaf area (TO:0000540) to the leaf dry weight (TO:0001014) or leaf dry mass (TO:New)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: spikelet length to width ratio
fields.definition: "A spikelet morphology trait (TO:0000657) which is the ratio of length to the width of a spikelet (PO:0009051)." [GR:pj, PO:0009051, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.\nRefer to width (PATO:0000921): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance from one side of an object to another side which is opposite.

fields.name: spikelet width
fields.definition: "A spikelet morphology trait (TO:0000657) which is the width of the spikelets (PO:0009051) present in a grass inflorescence." [GR:pj, PO:0009051, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to width (PATO:0000921): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance from one side of an object to another side which is opposite.

fields.name: spikelets per panicle length
fields.definition: "Number of spikelets present in the rice panicle per unit length." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf stomatal complex frequency
fields.definition: "A vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000419) which is the number of leaf stomatal complexes (PO:0025183) present on the leaf surface." [GR:pj]

fields.name: shoot axis weight
fields.definition: "Weight of the shoot without inflorescence." [GR:pj37]

fields.name: shoot fresh weight
fields.definition: "Fresh weight of the shoot without inflorescence." [GR:pj37]

fields.name: petal color
fields.definition: "A petal morphology trait (TO:0000863) which is the color of a petal (PO:0009032)." [GR:pj, PO:0009032, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color (PATO:0000014): A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: sepal color
fields.definition: "A sepal morphology trait (TO:0000864) which is the color of a sepal (PO:0009031) in a flower (PO:0009049)." [GR:pj, PO:0009031, PO:0009049, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color (PATO:0000014): A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: tepal color
fields.definition: "A tepal morphology trait (TO:0000865) which is the color of a tepal (PO:0009033)." [GR:pj, PO:0009033, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color (PATO:0000014): A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: endosperm morphology trait
fields.definition: "A portion of plant tissue morphology trait (TO:0000843) which is a quality of an endosperm (PO:0009089)." [PO:0009089, TO:moorel]

fields.name: stem length
fields.definition: "A stem morphology trait (TO:0000361) which is the length of the stem (PO:0009047)." [GR:pj37, PO:0009047, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Often measured from soil surface to highest point on stem.\nRefer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: stem angle
fields.definition: "A stem morphology trait (TO:0000361) which is the angle of a stem (PO:0009047)." [GR:pj, PO:0009047, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to angle (PATO:0002326): An orientation inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's placement at an angle.

fields.name: root fresh weight
fields.definition: "The average fresh weight of the root determined in a study." [GR:pj37]

fields.name: root dry weight to tiller number ratio
fields.definition: "The trait is an indirect measure of the balance between water absorption and transpiration." [GR:pj37]

fields.name: inflorescence color
fields.definition: "An inflorescence morphology trait (TO:0000373) which is the color of an inflorescence (PO:0009049)." [GR:pj, PO:0009049, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refer to color PATO:0000014: A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: inflorescence number
fields.definition: "An inflorescence morphology trait (TO:0000373) which is the average number of inflorescence (PO:0009049) per plant in a study." [GR:pj, PO:0009049, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to number of (PATO:0001555): The number of parts of a particular type that the bearer entity has. This is a relational quality, and thus holds between two entities: the bearer of the quality, and the type of parts.  The infloresence number is also an above ground biomas yield trait (TO:0000327).

fields.name: infructescence weight
fields.definition: "An infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000920) that is the average weight (mass) of an infructescence bearing mature fruit (PO:0009001)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to mass (PATO:0000125): A physical quality that inheres in a bearer by virtue of the proportion of the bearer's amount of matter.

fields.name: seminal root length
fields.definition: "A root length (TO:0000227) that is the length of one or more seminal roots (PO:0000046)." [GR:pj37, TO:seymour_megan\nTO\:austin_meier]
fields.comment: Seminal root is the primary root originating in a plant after germination.\nRefer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: endosperm quality
fields.definition: "A seed quality trait (TO:0000931) which is the quality of the endosperm (PO:0009089) texture, content, composition, size, etc." [GR:pj, PO:0009089]

fields.name: average grain weight
fields.definition: "A grain yield trait (TO:0000396) which is the average weight of a grain, including the caryopsis hull (PO:0006000)." [GR:pj, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: The average grain weight (TO:0000589) can be used to calculate the overall yield or produce from a field.

fields.name: dehulled grain weight
fields.definition: "A fruit weight (TO:0002746) which is the weight of one or more dehulled grains." [GR:pj, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: 100-dehulled grain weight
fields.definition: "Weight of the 100-dehulled grain having pericarp (seed coat)." [GR:pj]

fields.name: 1000-dehulled grain weight
fields.definition: "Weight of the 1000-dehulled grains having pericarp (seed coat)." [GR:pj]

fields.name: polished grain weight
fields.definition: "Weight of the polished grain (without hull and pericarp) weight." [GR:pj]

fields.name: 100-polished grain weight
fields.definition: "Weight of the 100-polished grain (without hull and pericarp) weight." [GR:pj]

fields.name: 1000-polished grain weight
fields.definition: "Weight of the 1000 polished grain (without hull and pericarp) weight." [GR:pj]

fields.name: quality trait
fields.definition: "A plant trait (TO:0000387) that is the commercial and /or economical value of the plant product, or its overall improvement." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Quality traits are often also classified as belonging to another upper level class such as: morphology trait (TO:0000017), biochemical trait (TO:0000277), growth and development trait (TO:0000357), stature or vigor trait (TO:0000133) and so on.

fields.name: protein content
fields.definition: "The total protein content measured in a plant or a plant part." [GR:pj37]

fields.name: enzyme activity trait
fields.definition: "A biochemical trait which is a quality of an enzymatic reaction." [] {comment="TO:cooperl"}
fields.comment: Catalysis of a biochemical reaction at physiological temperatures. In biologically catalyzed reactions, the reactants are known as substrates, and the catalysts are naturally occurring macromolecular substances known as enzymes. Enzymes possess specific binding sites for substrates, and are usually composed wholly or largely of protein, but RNA that has catalytic activity (ribozyme) is often also regarded as enzymatic. {xref="GO:0003824"}

fields.name: UV-A light sensitivity
fields.definition: "Response shown by the plant in the presence of UV-A light stress." [GR:pj]

fields.name: UV-B light sensitivity
fields.definition: "Response shown by the plant in the presence of UV-B light stress." [GR:pj]

fields.name: total fat content
fields.definition: "The total fat or lipid content of present in the plant or the plant part such as seed." [GR:pj]

fields.name: magnesium to potassium content ratio
fields.definition: "The ratio of total magnesium to potassium ion content measured in a plant or a plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: fat and essential oil content
fields.definition: "Measures the fat and essential oil content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: hydrogen peroxide content
fields.definition: "An assay to determine the content of hydrogen peroxide or the peroxide reactive ions." [GR:pj]

fields.name: diastatic power
fields.definition: "An assay to determine the joint action of alpha-amylase, beta-amylase and any other carbohydrate-degrading enzymes." [GR_REF:8025]

fields.name: ash content
fields.definition: "The total mineral or ion content measured after drying and burning the plant or a plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: sodium content
fields.definition: "The total sodium ion content measured in a plant or a plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: potassium content
fields.definition: "The total potassium ion content measured in a plant or a plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: soluble to total protein ratio
fields.definition: "The ratio of soluble protein to total protein content is a measure of the degree of proteolysis." [GR_REF:8025]
fields.comment: As seen in degree of modification of grain to malt in barley.

fields.name: malt-extract percentage
fields.definition: "It is a measure of the sugars and nitrogenous compounds available for yeast nutrition." [GR_REF:8025]

fields.name: grain density
fields.definition: "A grain quality trait (TO:0000162) that is a measure of the density or weight per unit of volume of a grain at a standardized moisture level." [GR_REF:8025, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: groat percentage
fields.definition: "It is defined as the amount of hull-less kernels obtained after de-hulling, expressed as a percentage of the weight of the sample." [GR_REF:8025]
fields.comment: This trait is most commonly used in determining the milling quality of Oat.

fields.name: lemma shape
fields.definition: "A lemma and palea morphology trait (TO:0000079) which is the shape of the lemma (PO:0009037) in a floret." [GR:pj, PO:0009037, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to shape PATO:0000052: A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's ratios of distances between its features (points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc).

fields.name: abscisic acid sensitivity
fields.definition: "Response with respect to application of abscisic acid." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf perimeter
fields.definition: "It is a measure of the total length covered by the leaf margin." [GR:pj]

fields.name: colored grain percentage
fields.definition: "Percentage of colored de-hulled grains in a sample of grains with reference color." [GR:pj]

fields.name: crushed grain percentage
fields.definition: "The percentage of cracked dehulled grain with at least one fourth of the size still intact." [GR:pj]

fields.name: vivipary
fields.definition: "A phenomenon associated to the seeds that germinate before becoming detached or harvested from the parent plant. Thus the germination occurs before the seed undergoes dormancy." [GR:pj]

fields.name: plant embryo development trait
fields.definition: "A whole plant growth and development trait (TO:0000947) that is a quality of a plant embryo development stage (PO:0007631)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: inflorescence development trait
fields.definition: "Traits associated with observing effects on the development of the inflorescence and its parts." [GR:pj]

fields.name: flower development trait
fields.definition: "Traits associated with observing effects on the development of the flower and its parts." [GR:pj]

fields.name: involucre bristle length
fields.definition: "An inflorescence bristle length trait (TO:0000643) that is the length of the bristles found on an involucre (PO:0009100)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: allelopathic effect
fields.definition: "This is an assay of any direct or indirect, harmful or beneficial effect of one plant on another through the production of chemical compounds (allelochemicals) that escape in the environment." [GR:pj]

fields.name: spikelet density
fields.definition: "A spikelet morphology trait (TO:0000657) which is the density of a spikelet (PO:0009051) in the inflorescence (PO:0009049) or on the given inflorescence branch (PO:0009081) order." [GR:pj, PO:0009049, PO:0009051, PO:0009081, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to density (PATO:0001019): A physical quality which inheres in a bearer by virtue of some influence is exerted by the bearer's mass per unit size.

fields.name: relative phosphorus distribution between shoot and root
pearl millet downy mildew resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Sclerospora graminicola (Sacc. ) Schroet. It causes the downy mildew disease in Pearl millet." [GR:pj]

fields.name: days to tassel
fields.definition: "It is determined as the number of days from the seed sowing to the stage when either the pollen shedding or anther exsertion occurs on the maize tassel." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Depends on the study type. For a study with multiple plants, on average 50% of the plants must have sheeding of pollen or anther exsertion.

fields.name: pedicel length
fields.definition: "Length of the pedicel." [GR:pj]

fields.name: stem node number
fields.definition: "A stem morphology trait (TO:0000361) which is the number of stem nodes (PO:0020141)." [GR:pj]

fields.name: total root number
fields.definition: "Total sum of number of roots in a plant derived per experiment." [GR:pj]

fields.name: inflorescence primary branch length
fields.definition: "An inflorescence primary branch morphology trait (TO:0000846) which the length of a second order inflorescence axis (PO:0006321)." [GR:pj, PO:0006321, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: leaf sheath diameter
fields.definition: "A leaf sheath morphology trait (TO:0000835) which is the measurement, in centimeters of the leaf sheath (PO:0020104) diameter." [GR:pj, PO:0020104, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to diameter (PATO:0001334): A length quality which is equal to the length of any straight line segment that passes through the center of a circle and whose endpoints are on the circular boundary.

fields.name: inflorescence bristle length
fields.definition: "An inflorescence morphology trait (TO:0000050) that is the length of the bristles found on an inflorescence (PO:0009049)." [GR:pj, PO:0009049, TO:moorel]

fields.name: relative root dry weight
fields.definition: "The relative (dry)weight of the root determined after a given treatment as compared to the one determined under normal conditions." [GR:pj]

fields.name: peduncle width
fields.definition: "A peduncle morphology trait (TO:0000776) which is the width of a peduncle (PO:0025386)." [GR:pj, PO:0025386, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to the width ((PATO:0000921):A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance from one side of an object to another side which is opposite) of a peduncle (PO:0009053).

fields.name: lemma length
fields.definition: "A lemma and palea morphology trait (TO:0000079) which is the length of the lemma (PO:0009037)." [GR:pj, PO:0009037, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length PATO:0000122: A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: leaf necrosis
fields.definition: "A leaf morphology trait (TO:0000748) which is the leaf surface area affected by abiotic stresses like insecticides and cold temperature as evidenced by chlorotic and/or necrotic tissue." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: If you are annotating to this term, please add an additional annotation to vascular leaf morphology (TO:0000419) or non-vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000925), depending on the species.

fields.name: seed growth and development trait
fields.definition: "A multi-tissue plant structure development trait (TO:0000927) that has as primary participant a seed (PO:0009010)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: shoot system growth and development trait
fields.definition: "A plant structure growth and development trait (TO:0000928) that is a quality of the growth of the shoot system (PO:0009006), and shoot system development stages (PO:0025527)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: leaf growth and development trait
fields.definition: "A plant organ development trait (TO:0000927) that has as primary participant a leaf (PO:0025034)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: root development trait
fields.definition: "Traits associated with observing effects on the development of the root and its parts." [GR:pj]

fields.name: spikelet morphology trait
fields.definition: "An inflorescence morphology trait (TO:0000373) which is a quality of a spikelet (PO:0009051)." [GR:pj, PO:0009051, TO:cooperl, TO:moorel]

fields.name: days to silk
fields.definition: "It is determined as the number of days from the seed sowing to the first visible silk (stigma) on the maize ear." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Depends on the study type. For a study with multiple plants, on average 50% of the plants must have exposed silks.

fields.name: phyllochron
fields.definition: "The time interval between the appearance of successive leaves (days/leaf) on the developing shoot." [GR:pj]

fields.name: barley fusarium head blight resistance
fields.definition: "Caused by Fusarium graminearum Schwabe, that affects the quality and yield of barley (Hordeum vulgare L.) grain." [GR:pj]

fields.name: wheat fusarium head blight resistance
fields.definition: "Caused by Fusarium graminearum Schwabe (teleomorph: Gibberella zeae), in the USA and Canada. It causes severe yield and quality losses in wheat (Triticum aestivum L.)." [GR:pj]

fields.name: grain core area white
fields.definition: "Measurement of the whitish area found in the dehulled grain." [GR:pj]

fields.name: cooking or brewing quality
fields.definition: "The quality trait of the seed or the products derived from it." [GR:pj]

fields.name: mycotoxin content
fields.definition: "Measuring amount of toxins found in the host plant after the infection by a fungal pathogen. The toxin is produced by the pathogen." [GR:pj]

fields.name: deoxynivalenol content
fields.definition: "Measuring amount of mycotoxin deoxynivalenol found in the host plant after the infection by a fungus Fusarium sp." [GR:pj, PMID:12897863]

fields.name: floret number
fields.definition: "The number of flowers present on a inflorescence branch or in the inflorescence itself." [GR:pj]

fields.name: tetraploid wheat fusarium head blight resistance
fields.definition: "Caused by Fusarium graminearum Schwabe (telomorph: Gibberella zeae), in the USA and Canada. It causes severe yield and quality losses in wheat (Triticum turgidum)." [GR:pj]

fields.name: phytochemical compound content
fields.definition: "They are non-nutritive plant chemicals that have protective or disease preventive properties." [GR:pj]

fields.name: ferulic acid content
fields.definition: "Amount of ferulic acid content determined in a given plant part. Ferulic acid is an antioxidant which neutralizes free radicals (superoxide, nitric oxide and hydroxyl radical) which could cause oxidative damage of cell membranes and DNA. Ferulic acid helps to prevent damage to the cells caused by ultraviolet light." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: It is found in the leaves and seeds of many plants, but especially in cereals such as brown rice, whole wheat and oats.

fields.name: style color
fields.definition: "Style color is determined from blooming flowers or florets." [GR:pj]

fields.name: third leaf position
fields.definition: "A leaf position (TO:0000541) which is the position of the third leaf (PO:0025034) on a plant." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to: position (PATO_0000140): A spatial quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's spatial location relative to other objects in the vicinity.

fields.name: cob diameter
fields.definition: "An infructescence axis morphology trait (TO:0000921) which is the diameter of a cob." [POC:Cooperl]
fields.comment: The cob is the first order infructescence axis PO:0025244 of the ear infructescence (new). Refers to diameter (PATO:0001334): A length quality which is equal to the length of any straight line segment that passes through the center of a circle and whose endpoints are on the circular boundary. In maize, this is measured in centimeters.

fields.name: ear circumference
fields.definition: "An ear infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000976) that is the circumference of an ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to circumference (PATO:0001648):  An 1-D extent quality which is equal to the length of the closed curve of a circle. Ear circumference (TO:0000681) is equal to ear diameter (TO:0000433) times 3.14.

fields.name: inflorescence height
fields.definition: "An inflorescence morphology trait (TO:0000373) which is the height of an inflorescence (PO:0009049) measured from ground to the attachment point." [GR:pj, PO:0009049, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to height (PATO:0000119):  A 1-D extent quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's vertical dimension of extension.

fields.name: ear infructescence position
fields.definition: "An ear infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000976) which is the position of an ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refers to: position (PATO_0000140): A spatial quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's spatial location relative to other objects in the vicinity.  In maize this is usually measured from the ground to the attachment point of the ear.

fields.name: grassy flavor
fields.definition: "An assay to test for aroma and flavor reminiscent of freshly cut grass." [GR:pj]

fields.name: fruit tenderness
fields.definition: "An assay for the soft and juicy texture." [GR:pj]

fields.name: juiciness
fields.definition: "An assay for a juicy appetizingness." [GR:pj]

fields.name: kernel row number per ear
fields.definition: "An infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000920) which is the number of rows of kernels per ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: In maize, kernel row number is counted on the central, widest part of the uppermost ear infructescence. In comparing to teosinte "rank",  kernel row number is divided by two.

fields.name: kernel row length
fields.definition: "A infructescence yield trait (TO:0000936) which is the length of a kernel row from base to where kernels end on the ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: maysin content
fields.definition: "Measures the maysin content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Maysin is a coagulable globulin protein produced by the maize plant. It has insecticide properties.

fields.name: Zea mays northern leaf blight disease resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Setosphaeria turcica." [GR:pj]

fields.name: NCLB area under disease progress curve
fruit crispness
fields.definition: "An assay of firmness and freshness of the fruit." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf margin color
fields.definition: "A leaf margin morphology trait (TO:0002635) which is the color of a leaf margin (PO:0020128)." [PO:0020128, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color (PATO:0000014): A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: starch content
fields.definition: "Amount of starch present in the plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: starch yield
fields.definition: "An assay to determine the starch yield from a bigger sample such as from a given population or from a plot or field. It is often carried out initially with the smaller sample but later converted to associate with a large sample for example record starch yield in kilograms per hectare." [GR:pj]

fields.name: sucrose synthase activity trait
fields.definition: "Catalysis of the reaction: UDP-glucose + D-fructose = UDP + sucrose." [GO:GO\:0016157]

fields.name: fruit sweetness
fields.definition: "The quality of having the pleasant taste characteristic of sugar." [GR:pj]

fields.name: turgor pressure
fields.definition: "The pressure within the cell resulting from the absorption of water into the vacuole and the imbibition of water by the protoplasm." [GR:pj]

fields.name: starch concentration
fields.definition: "Concentration of starch present in the plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: amylase activity trait
fields.definition: "Catalysis of the hydrolysis of amylose or an amylose derivative." [GR:pj]

fields.name: phosphatase activity trait
fields.definition: "Catalysis of the hydrolysis of phosphoric monoesters, releasing inorganic phosphate." [GO:GO\:0016791]

fields.name: acid phosphatase activity
fields.definition: "Catalysis of the reaction: an orthophosphoric monoester + H2O = an alcohol + phosphate." [EC:3.1.3.2, GO:0003993]

fields.name: hull color
fields.definition: "Describes the color of hull." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Hull is the dry outer covering of a grass fruit/grain. The hull is comprised of dry lemma and palea, the two parts of a grass floret.

fields.name: pericarp color
fields.definition: "A pericarp morphology trait (TO:0000945) that is the color of the pericarp (PO:0009084)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Pericarp is the wall of a fruit, developed from the ovary or carpel wall. Also scored for grain color or color of the dehulled grain in grasses.

fields.name: plant color
fields.definition: "A whole plant morphology trait (TO:0000398) which is the color of a whole plant (PO:0000003)." [GR:pj, PO:0000003, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: leaf gloss
fields.definition: "A leaf morphology trait (TO:0000748) which is the appearance of glossiness of the leaf surface. Contributed by change in either the amount or content of cuticle wax (PO:0025386) on a leaf (PO:0025034)." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: If you are annotating to this term, please add an additional annotation to vascular leaf morphology (TO:0000419) or non-vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000925), depending on the species.

fields.name: globulin protein content
fields.definition: "Assay to detrmine the amount of globulin proteins." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Globulin proteins also called globular  proteins, or spheroproteins are one of the main protein classes. These have a globelike protein structure, that is more or less soluble in aqueous solutions. The two major sub classes are alpha and beta globulins.

fields.name: imidazolinone sensitivity
fields.definition: "An assay to determine the tolerance exhibited by a plant or a group of plants (population) towards the applied herbicide imidazolinone." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: It is expected that the herbicide application must not affect the agronomic yield, if any.

fields.name: sulfonylurea herbicide sensitivity
fields.definition: "An assay to determine the tolerance exhibited by a plant or a group of plants (population) towards the applied herbicide sulfonylurea." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: It is expected that the herbicide application must not affect the agronomic yield, if any.

fields.name: brittle endosperm
fields.definition: "An endosperm morphology trait (TO:0000575) which is a brittle endosperm (PO:0009089)." [PO:0009089, TO:moorel]

fields.name: seminal rootless
fields.definition: "Absence of seminal roots in the plant." [GR:pj]

fields.name: fascicled ear
fields.definition: "In maize ears, the floral meristems undergo repeated dichotomous branching, resulting in fascicled (highly branched and bundled or clustered) ears." [GR:pj]

fields.name: etched endosperm
fields.definition: "An endosperm morphology trait (TO:0000575) which is an etched endosperm (PO:0009089)." [PO:0009089, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: This is also an endosperm quality trait (TO:0000587).

fields.name: rough endosperm
fields.definition: "An endosperm morphology trait (TO:0000575) which is a rough endosperm (PO:0009089)." [PO:0009089, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: This is also an endosperm quality trait (TO:0000587). Refers to rough PATO:0000700 A texture quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's irregular surface.

fields.name: leaf vein color
fields.definition: "A leaf vein morphology trait (TO:0000820) which is the color of a leaf lamina vein (PO:0020138)." [PO:0020138, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color (PATO:0000014): A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: leaf adherence
fields.definition: "A leaf morphology trait (TO:0000748) which is a tightly rolled leaf encasing the next emerging leaf (PO:0025034)." [GR:pj, PO:0025034\,TO\:cooperl]
fields.comment: If you are annotating to this term, please add an additional annotation to vascular leaf morphology (TO:0000419) or non-vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000925), depending on the species.

fields.name: sporocyte development trait
fields.definition: "Traits associated with observing effects on the sporocyte development." [GR:pj]

fields.name: microsporocyte development trait
fields.definition: "Traits associated with observing effects on the microsporocyte development." [GR:pj]

fields.name: megasporocyte development trait
fields.definition: "Traits associated with observing effects on the megasporocyte development." [GR:pj]

fields.name: megasporocyte number
fields.definition: "A count of the number of megasporocyte that is done to determine any increase or decrease in number." [GR:pj]

fields.name: microsporocyte number
fields.definition: "A count of the number of microsporocyte that is done to determine any increase or decrease in number." [GR:pj]

fields.name: sporogenesis
fields.definition: "The formation of spores." [GR:pj]

fields.name: cell cycle trait
fields.definition: "The traits associated with various developmental landmarks and processes of cell division during either the meiotic cell cycle or mitotic cell cycle." [R:pj]

fields.name: meiotic cell cycle trait
fields.definition: "The traits associated with various developmental landmarks and processes of cell division during either the meiotic cell cycle." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Meiosis is a type of cell division in which haploid gametes and spores are formed. The process involves a single duplication of the genetic material followed by two mitotic divisions. As a result each daughter cell receives half the chromosomal content (haploid) as the parent cell.

fields.name: mitotic cell cycle trait
fields.definition: "The traits associated with various developmental landmarks and processes of cell division during the mitotic cell cycle." [GO:pj]
fields.comment: Mitosis is a type of cell division in which a cell duplicates its genetic information (DNA), in order to generate two, identical, daughter cells. Each daughter cell receives the same chromosome number / genetic content as the parent cell.

fields.name: lignin content
fields.definition: "Measures the lignin content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: lignin biosynthesis trait
fields.definition: "Traits associated with the biosynthesis of lignin in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: grain length
fields.definition: "A fruit length (TO:0002626) of the dehulled grain with pericarp (PO:0009084)." [GR:pj, PO:0009084, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: plastochron
fields.definition: "The time between the initiation of two leaves on the shoot apical meristem is called a plastochron." [GR:pj]

fields.name: plant organ morphology trait
fields.definition: "A multi-tissue plant structure morphology trait (TO:0000836) which is a quality of a plant organ (PO:0009008)." [PO:0009008, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: plant aspect
fields.definition: "A stature or vigor trait (TO:0000133) that is a qualitative score of the visual appeal (ideotype) of the whole plant (PO:0000003)." [TO:curators]
fields.comment: Includes visual scoring of plant characteristics such as plant height (TO:0000207), uniformity of plants, plant damage by diseases and insects and lodging incidence (TO:0000068).

fields.name: plant axis morphology trait
fields.definition: "A plant organ morphology trait (TO:0000736) which is a quality of a plant axis (PO:0025004)." [PO:0025004, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: shoot axis morphology trait
fields.definition: "A plant axis morphology trait (TO:0000738) which is a quality of a shoot axis (PO:0025029)." [PO:0025029, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: branch morphology trait
fields.definition: "A shoot axis morphology trait (TO:0000739) which is a quality of a branch (PO:0025073)." [PO:0025073, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: tuber morphology trait
fields.definition: "A plant axis morphology trait (TO:0000738) which is quality of a tuber (PO:0004543)." [PO:0004543, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: subterranean shoot axis tuber morphology trait
fields.definition: "A tuber morphology trait (TO:0000741) which is a quality of a subterranean tuber (PO:0004547)." [PO:0004547, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: subterranean shoot axis tuber shape
fields.definition: "A subterranean tuber morphology trait (TO:0000742) which is the shape of a subterranean tuber (PO:0004547)." [PO:0004547, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refer to shape (PATO:0000052): A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's ratios of distances between its features (points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc).

fields.name: subterranean shoot axis tuber size
fields.definition: "A subterranean tuber morphology trait (TO:0000742) which is the size of a subterranean tuber (PO:0004547)." [PO:0004547, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude.

fields.name: subterranean shoot axis tuber appearance
fields.definition: "A subterranean tuber morphology trait (TO:0000742) which is the appearance of a subterranean tuber (PO:0004547)." [PO:0004547, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: A 1-9 scale is used to score the overall appearance of the tuber, with 1 the lowest score (very poor) and 9 the highest (excellent).

fields.name: subterranean shoot axis tuber mass
fields.definition: "A subterranean tuber morphology trait (TO:0000742) which is the mass of a subterranean tuber (PO:0004547)." [PO:0004547, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refer to mass (PATO:0000125): A physical quality that inheres in a bearer by virtue of the proportion of the bearer's amount of matter.

fields.name: phyllome morphology trait
fields.definition: "A plant organ morphology trait (TO:0000736) which is quality of a phyllome (PO:0006001)." [PO:0006001, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: leaf morphology trait
fields.definition: "A phyllome morphology trait (TO:0000747) which is quality of a leaf (PO:0025034)." [PO:0025034, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: cotyledon morphology trait
fields.definition: "A vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000419) which is a quality of a cotyledon (PO:0020030)." [PO:0020030, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: seedling cotyledon color
fields.definition: "A seedling cotyledon morphology trait (TO:0000774) which is the color of a seedling cotyledon (PO:0025471)." [PO:0025471, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: seedling cotyledon number
fields.definition: "A seedling cotyledon morphology trait (TO:0000774) which is the number of seedling cotyledons (PO:0025471)." [PO:0025471, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: seedling cotyledon size
fields.definition: "A seedling cotyledon morphology trait (TO:0000774) which is the size of a seedling cotyledon (PO:0025471)." [PO:0025471, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: coleoptile morphology trait
fields.definition: "A plant organ morphology trait (TO:0000736) which is a quality of a coleoptile (PO:0020033)." [PO:0020033, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: cardinal organ part morphology trait
fields.definition: "A cardinal organ part of a multi-tissue plant structure morphology trait (TO:0000837) which is a quality of a cardinal organ part (PO:0025001)." [PO:0025001, POC:cooperl, TO:moorel]

fields.name: shoot axis internode morphology trait
fields.definition: "A cardinal organ part morphology trait (TO:0000754) which is a quality of a shoot axis internode (PO:0005005)." [PO:0005005, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: stem internode morphology trait
fields.definition: "A shoot axis internode morphology trait (TO:0000755) which is a quality of a stem internode (PO:0020142)." [PO:0020142, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: hypocotyl morphology trait
fields.definition: "A stem internode morphology trait (TO:0000756) which is a quality of a hypocotyl (PO:0020100)." [PO:0020100, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: mesocotyl morphology trait
fields.definition: "A stem internode morphology trait (TO:0000756) which is a quality of a mesocotyl (PO:0020037)." [PO:0020037, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: seedling hypocotyl color
fields.definition: "A seedling hypocotyl morphology trait (TO:0000769) which is the color of a seedling hypocotyl (PO:0025291)." [PO:0025291, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: The color of a seedling hypocotyl (PO:0025291) during the hypocotyl emergence stage (PO:0007043).

fields.name: seedling hypocotyl green
fields.definition: "A seedling hypocotyl color trait (TO:0000759) where a hypocotyl (PO:0020100) is observed to have the color green." [PATO:0000320, PO:0020100, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to green (PATO:0000320): A color hue with medium-low wavelength of that portion of the visible spectrum lying between yellow and blue, evoked in the human observer by radiant energy with wavelengths of approximately 490 to 570 nanometers.

fields.name: seedling hypocotyl green with bronze band
fields.definition: "A seedling hypocotyl color trait (TO:0000759) where a hypocotyl (PO:0020100) is observed to have the color green with a bronze band." [PATO:0000320, PO:0020100, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to green ((PATO:0000320): A color hue with medium-low wavelength of that portion of the visible spectrum lying between yellow and blue, evoked in the human observer by radiant energy with wavelengths of approximately 490 to 570 nanometers) and bronze ((PATO:0002363): A medium brown color with a metallic sheen, resembles the actual alloy bronze).

fields.name: seedling hypocotyl purple
fields.definition: "A seedling hypocotyl color trait (TO:0000759) where a hypocotyl (PO:0020100) is observed to have the color purple." [PATO:0000951, PO:0020100, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to purple (PATO:0000951): A color that falls about midway between red and blue in hue.

fields.name: seedling hypocotyl dark purple
fields.definition: "A seedling hypocotyl color trait (TO:0000759) where a hypocotyl (PO:0020100) is observed to have the color dark purple." [PATO:0001259, PO:0020100, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to dark purple (PATO:0001259): A color consisting of purple color and low brightness.

fields.name: stalk morphology trait
fields.definition: "A cardinal organ part morphology trait (TO:0000754) which is a quality of a stalk (PO:0025066)." [PO:0025066, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: petiole morphology trait
fields.definition: "A stalk morphology trait (TO:0000764) which is a quality of a petiole (PO:0020038)." [PO:0020038, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: petiole length
fields.definition: "A petiole morphology trait (TO:0000765) which is the length of a petiole (PO:0020038)." [PO:0020038, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: petiole shape
fields.definition: "A petiole morphology trait (TO:0000765) which is the shape of a petiole (PO:0020038)." [PO:0020038, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: petiole size
fields.definition: "A petiole morphology trait (TO:0000765) which is the size of a petiole (PO:0020038)." [PO:0020038, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: seedling hypocotyl morphology trait
fields.definition: "A hypocotyl morphology trait (TO:0000757) which a seedling hypocotyl (PO:0025291)." [PO:0025291, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Use this term to describe traits for a seedling hypocotyl (PO:002529; a hypocotyl (PO:0020100) that is part of a whole plant (PO:0000003) in the seedling development stage (PO:0007131)).

fields.name: bacterial blight disease resistance
fields.definition: "A bacterial disease resistance (TO:0000315) that is involved in the response to bacterial blight disease." [POC:cooperl]

fields.name: embryo hypocotyl morphology trait
fields.definition: "A hypocotyl morphology trait (TO:0000757) which is a quality of an embryo hypocotyl (PO:0025290)." [PO:0025290, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Use this term to describe traits for embryo hypocotyl (A hypocotyl (PO:0020100) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009)).

fields.name: seedling mesocotyl morphology trait
fields.definition: "A mesocotyl morphology trait (TO:0000758) which is a quality of a seedling mesocotyl (PO:0025295)." [PO:0025295, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Use this term to descride traits for seedling mesocotyl (PO:0025295: A seedling mesocotyl is an elongation of and embryonic mesocotyl that is part of a whole plant in the seedling phase).

fields.name: embryo mesocotyl morphology trait
fields.definition: "A mesocotyl morphology trait (TO:0000758) which is a quality of an embryo mesocotyl (PO:0025294)." [PO:0025294, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: seedling cotyledon morphology trait
fields.definition: "A cotyledon morphology trait (TO:0000749) which is a quality of a seedling cotyledon (PO:0025471)." [PO:0025471, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Use this term to describe traits for a seedling cotyledon ((PO:0025471):A cotyledon (PO:0020030) that is part of a whole plant (PO:0000003) in the seedling development stage (PO:0007131)).

fields.name: plant embryo cotyledon morphology trait
fields.definition: "A cotyledon morphology trait (TO:0000749) which is a quality of a plant embryo cotyledon (PO:0025470)." [PO:0025470, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Use this term to describe traits for an plant embryo cotyledon (PO:0025470): A cotyledon (PO:0020030) that is part of a plant embryo (PO:0009009).

fields.name: peduncle morphology trait
fields.definition: "A shoot axis morphology trait (TO:0000739) which is a quality of a peduncle (PO:0009053)." [PO:0009053, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: peduncle waxiness

fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.
