fields.definition: "A flower morphology trait (TO:0000499) which is the type of a flower (PO:0009046)." [PO:0009046, TO:moorel]

fields.name: cleistogamus flower
fields.definition: "A flower type trait (TO:0000881) which is a flower (PO:0009046) that does not open and favors self pollination." [PO:0009046, TO:moorel]

fields.name: chasmogamous flower
fields.definition: "A flower type trait (TO:0000881) which is a flower (PO:0009046) that opens exposing anthers (PO:0009066) and/or pistil." [PO:0009046, PO:0009066, TO:moorel]

fields.name: petiolule morphology trait
fields.definition: "A stalk morphology trait (TO:0000764) which is a quality of a petiolule (PO:0020050)." [PO:0020050, TO:moorel]

fields.name: petiolule color
fields.definition: "A petiolule morphology trait (TO:0000884) which is the color of the petiolule (PO:0020050)." [PO:0020050, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color (PATO:0000014): A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: petiolule shape
fields.definition: "A petiolule morphology trait (TO:0000884) which is the shape of the petiolule (PO:0020050)." [PO:0020050, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to shape (PATO:0000052): A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's ratios of distances between its features (points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc).

fields.name: petiolule length
fields.definition: "A petiolule morphology trait (TO:0000884) which is the length of the petiolule (PO:0020050)." [PO:0020050, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: seed coat luster
fields.definition: "A seed coat morphology trait (TO:0000838) which is the luster of the seed coat (PO:0009088)." [PO:0009088, TO:moorel]

fields.name: seed coat hardness
fields.definition: "A seed coat morphology trait (TO:0000838) which is the hardness of the seed coat (PO:0009088)." [PO:0009088, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to hardness (PATO:0000048): A physical quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's disposition to being turned, bowed, or twisted without breaking.

fields.name: seed coat proportion
fields.definition: "A seed coat morphology trait (TO:0000838) which is the relative proportion of seed coat (PO:0009088) to cotyledon (PO:0020030)." [PO:0009088, PO:0020030, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to proportion (PATO:0001470): A quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's magnitude in respect to a related entity.

fields.name: leaf wet weight
fields.definition: "A leaf weight trait (TO:0000505) which is the the measure of the wet weight of a leaf (PO:0025034)." [PO:0025034, TO:moorel]

fields.name: stem size
fields.definition: "A stem morphology trait (TO:0000361) which is the size of a stem (PO:0009047)." [PO:0009047, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude.

fields.name: stem shape
fields.definition: "A stem morphology trait (TO:0000361) which is the shape of a stem (PO:0009047)." [PO:0009047, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to shape (PATO:0000052): A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's ratios of distances between its features (points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc).

fields.name: fruit number trait
fields.definition: "An infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000920) which is the number of fruits (PO:0009001)." [PO:0009001, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to has number of (PATO:0001555): The number of parts of a particular type that the bearer entity has. This is a relational quality, and thus holds between two entities: the bearer of the quality, and the type of parts.

fields.name: fruit harvest index
fields.definition: "A harvest index (TO:0000128) which is the percent of usable fruit (PO:0009001)." [PO:0009001, TO:moorel]

fields.name: leaf harvest index
fields.definition: "A harvest index (TO:0000128) which is the percent of usable leaves (PO:0025034)." [PO:0025034, TO:moorel]

fields.name: seed harvest index
fields.definition: "A harvest index (TO:0000128) which is the percent of usable seeds (PO:0009010)." [PO:0009010, TO:moorel]

fields.name: root nodule morphology trait
fields.definition: "A cardinal organ part morphology trait (TO:0000754) which is a quality of a root nodule (PO:0003023)." [PO:0003023, TO:moorel]

fields.name: root nodule weight
fields.definition: "A root nodule morphology trait (TO:0000898) which is the weight of a root nodule (PO:0003023)." [PO:0003023, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to weight (PATO:0000128): A physical quality inhering in a bearer that has mass near a gravitational body.

fields.name: root nodule number
fields.definition: "A root nodule morphology trait (TO:0000898) which is the number of root nodules (PO:0003023)." [PO:0003023, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to has number of (PATO:0001555): The number of parts of a particular type that the bearer entity has. This is a relational quality, and thus holds between two entities: the bearer of the quality, and the type of parts.

fields.name: dry fruit color
fields.definition: "A fruit color (TO:0002617) which is the color of a fruit (PO:0009001) that has been dried." [PO:0009001, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color (PATO:0000014): A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts. Refer to decreased water composition (PATO:0001801): A composition quality inhering in an bearer by virtue of the reduction in amount of water the bearer contains.

fields.name: seed coat pigment bleeding
fields.definition: "A seed coat morphology trait (TO:0000838) which is the bleeding of pigment in a seed coat (PO:0009088)." [PO:0009088, TO:moorel]

fields.name: seed coat texture
fields.definition: "A seed coat morphology trait (TO:0000838) which is the texture of a seed coat (PO:0009088)." [PO:0009088, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to texture (PATO:0000150): A morphologic quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's relative size, organization and distribution of its surface elements or the representation or invention of the appearance of its surface; visual and tactile surface characteristics.

fields.name: seed coat pattern
fields.definition: "A seed coat morphology trait (TO:0000838) which is the pattern of a seed coat (PO:0009088)." [PO:0009088, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color pattern (PATO:0000019): A chromatic property that is the relative position of different hues or degrees of saturation.

fields.name: seed yield trait
fields.definition: "A shoot system yield trait  (TO:0000327) which is the yield of seeds (PO:0009010)." [PO:0009010, TO:cooperl, TO:moorel]

fields.name: exocarp morphology trait
fields.definition: "A portion of plant tissue morphology trait (TO:0000843) which is a quality of the exocarp (PO:0009085)." [PO:cooperl]

fields.name: exocarp thickness
fields.definition: "An exocarp morphology trait (TO:0000906) (TO:0000843) which is the thickness of the exocarp (PO:0009085)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: fruit hollowness
fields.definition: "A fruit morphology trait (TO:0002617) which is the hollowness of a fruit (PO:0009001)." [PATO:0002078, PO:0009001, PO:cooperl]

fields.name: fruit color uniformity
fields.definition: "A fruit color trait (TO:0002617) which is the uniformity of the color (PATO:0000122) of the fruit (PO:0009001) ." [PATO:0000122, PO:cooperl]
fields.comment: The proportion of the 2D area of the red color epicarp out of the total epicarp area visible from a top view of the proximal fruit end.

fields.name: fruit bitterness trait
fields.definition: "A fruit flavor trait (TO:0002694) which is the bitter fruit flavor." [TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Need PATO quality: bitter - has been requested.

fields.name: trichome morphology trait
fields.definition: "A plant structure morphology trait (TO:0000839) which is a quality of a trichome (PO:0000282)." [PO:0000282, TO:moorel]

fields.name: trichome appressed
fields.definition: "A trichome morphology trait (TO:0000911) which is a trichome (PO:0000282) lying close to and flat against a surface of a plant structure (PO:0009011)." [PO:0000282, TO:moorel]

fields.name: trichome acircular
fields.definition: "A trichome morphology trait (TO:0000911) which is a needle-shaped trichome (PO:0000282)." [PO:0000282, TO:moorel]

fields.name: trichome canescent
fields.definition: "A trichome morphology trait (TO:0000911) which is a gray-haired and hoary trichome (PO:0000282)." [PO:0000282, TO:moorel]

fields.name: trichome capillary
fields.definition: "A trichome morphology trait (TO:0000911) which is a very slender or hair-like trichome (PO:0000282)." [PO:0000282, TO:moorel]

fields.name: trichome clavate
fields.definition: "A trichome morphology trait (TO:0000911) which is a club-shaped trichome (PO:0000282)." [PO:0000282, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Clavate (PATO:0001883): A concave 3-D shape quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's gradually becoming thicker towards the end.

fields.name: trichome ensiform
fields.definition: "A trichome morphology trait (TO:0000911) which is  a sword-shaped trichome (PO:0000282)." [PO:0000282, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Blade-like (PATO:0002235): A tapered shape quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's being flat, slender, and tapering to a point. Synonym: ensiform.

fields.name: trichome hirsute
fields.definition: "A trichome morphology trait (TO:0000911) which is a rough trichome (PO:0000282)." [PO:0000282, TO:moorel]

fields.name: kernel weight
fields.definition: "A fruit weight (TO:0002746) which is the weight of one or more kernels." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: infructescence morphology trait
fields.definition: "A reproductive shoot system morphology trait (TO:0000786) which is a quality of the infructescence (PO:0006342)." [POC:cooperl]

fields.name: infructescence axis morphology trait
fields.definition: "A shoot axis morphology trait (TO:0000739) which is a quality of an infructescence axis (PO:0025242)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: cob weight
fields.definition: "An infructescence axis morphology trait (TO:0000921) which is the weight of a cob." [TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refers to mass (PATO:0000125) A physical quality that inheres in a bearer by virtue of the proportion of the bearer's amount of matter.

fields.name: ear weight
fields.definition: "An ear infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000976) that is the weight of an ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to mass (PATO:0000125): A physical quality that inheres in a bearer by virtue of the proportion of the bearer's amount of matter.

fields.name: cob color
fields.definition: "An infructescence axis morphology trait (TO:0000921) which is the color of a cob." [TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refers to color (PATO:0000014) A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: non-vascular leaf morphology trait
fields.definition: "A leaf morphology trait (TO:0000748) which is a quality of a non-vascular leaf (PO:0025075)." [PO:0025075, TO:moorel]

fields.name: multi-tissue plant structure growth and development trait
fields.definition: "A plant structure growth and development trait (TO:0000928) that has as primary participant a multi-tissue plant structure (PO:0025496)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: plant organ growth and development trait
fields.definition: "A multi-tissue plant structure development trait (TO:0000927) that has as primary participant a plant organ (PO:0009008)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: plant structure growth and development trait
fields.definition: "A plant growth and development trait (TO:0000357) which is a quality of a plant structure development stage (PO:0009028)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: fruit growth and development trait
fields.definition: "A multi-tissue plant structure development trait (TO:0000927) that has as primary participant a fruit (PO:0009001)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: seed shattering
fields.definition: "A seed growth and development trait (TO:0000653) which is the extent of seed shattering based on the development of an abscission zone (PO:0000146)." [PO:0000146, TO:moorel]

fields.name: seed quality trait
fields.definition: "A quality trait (TO:0000597) which is the commercial and /or economical value of a seed (PO:0009010) , or its overall improvement." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: mannose content
fields.definition: "A hexose content trait (TO:0000307) which is the amount of mannose (CHEBI:37684)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: plant phenological trait
fields.definition: "A growth and development trait (TO:0000357) which is the timing of the occurrence of plant structure development stages (PO:0009012) and the relevant biological processes (GO:0008150)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: photoperiod-sensitive flowering time trait
fields.definition: "A flowering time trait (TO:0002616) which is the difference between the time to flowering stage (PO:0007616) in long photoperiod (EO:0007199) and short photoperiod (EO:0007200) environments." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: kernel weight per ear
fields.definition: "A kernel weight (TO:0000919) which is the total weight of all kernels on the primary ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [MaizeGDB:Mary_Schaeffer, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: infructescence yield trait
fields.definition: "A shoot system yield trait (TO:0000327) which is a quality of an infructescence (PO:0006342), or the number born on a plant." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: kernel number per ear
fields.definition: "An infructescence yield trait (TO:0000936) that is the number of kernels (fruit; PO:0009001) per ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [PMID:22027895, TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Often calculated as the number of kernel rows in the middle of the ear times number of kernels per row. Also calculated based on total weight of kernels for an ear and average weight/kernel (Hung et al 2012).

fields.name: kernel number per row
fields.definition: "An infructescence yield trait (TO:0000936) that is the number of kernels (fruit; PO:0009001) per row on an ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: rank number per ear
fields.definition: "An infructescence yield trait (TO:0000936) which is the number of ranks of cupules per ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Used to look at QTL traits in crosses between Teosinte and maize. In order to compare the two types of ears, the kernel row number (TO:0000687; maize) is divided by two.

fields.name: aleurone layer morphology trait
fields.definition: "A portion of plant tissue morphology trait (TO:0000843) which is the qualities of the aleurone layer (PO:0005360)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: aleurone layer color
fields.definition: "An aleurone layer appearance (TO:0000944) that is the color of the aleurone layer (PO:0005360)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: aleurone layer appearance
fields.definition: "An aleurone layer morphology trait (TO:0000942) that is the appearance of the aleurone layer (PO:0005360)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: pericarp morphology trait
fields.definition: "A portion of plant tissue morphology trait (TO:0000843) which is a quality of the pericarp (PO:0009084)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: endocarp morphology trait
fields.definition: "A portion of plant tissue morphology trait (TO:0000843) which is a quality of the endocarp (PO:0009086)." [TO:austin_meier]

fields.name: whole plant growth and development trait
fields.definition: "A plant structure growth and development trait (TO:0000928) which is a quality of a whole plant development stage (PO:0007033)." [TO:ethan_johnson]

fields.name: mesocarp morphology trait
fields.definition: "A portion of plant tissue morphology trait (TO:0000843) which is a quality of a mesocarp (PO:0009087)." [TO:austin_meier]

fields.name: seedling growth and development trait
fields.definition: "A whole plant growth and development trait (TO:0000947) which is a quality of a seedling  development stage (PO:0007131)." [TO:ethan_johnson]

fields.name: corolla morphology trait
fields.definition: "A collective phyllome structure morphology trait (TO:0000845) that is a quality of a corolla (PO:0009059)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: corolla color
fields.definition: "A corolla morphology trait (TO:0000950) that is the color of a corolla (PO:0009059)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: stem weight
fields.definition: "A stem morphology trait (TO:0000361) which is the weight of a stem (PO:0009047)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: stem number
fields.definition: "A shoot system morphology trait (TO:0000077) which is the number of stems (PO:0009047)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: spikelet rachilla morphology trait
fields.definition: "An inflorescence branch morphology trait (TO:0000784) which is a quality of a spikelet rachilla (PO:0009080)." [TO:Ethan_Johnson]

fields.name: cyanide content
fields.definition: "A metabolite content related trait (TO:0000281) which is the amount of cyanide (CHEBI:17514) occurring in a plant anatomical entity (PO:0025131)." []

fields.name: cob shape
fields.definition: "An infructescence axis morphology trait (TO:0000921) which is the shape of a cob." [TO:ejohnson]

fields.name: cob length
fields.definition: "An infructescence axis morphology trait (TO:0000921) which is the length of a cob." [TO:ejohnson]

fields.name: cob width
fields.definition: "An infructescence axis morphology trait (TO:0000921) which is the width of a cob." [TO:ejohnson]

fields.name: cob area
fields.definition: "An infructescence axis morphology trait (TO:0000921) which is the area of a cob." [TO:ejohnson]

fields.name: cob angle
fields.definition: "An infructescence axis morphology trait (TO:0000921) which is the angle of a cob." [TO:ejohnson]

fields.name: ear color
fields.definition: "An ear infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000976) which is the color of an ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [TO:Ethan_Johnson]

fields.name: ear shape
fields.definition: "An ear infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000976) which is the shape of an ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [TO:Ethan_Johnson]

fields.name: ear aspect
fields.definition: "An ear infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000976) which is the qualitative rating of the harvested ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [TO:Ethan_Johnson]

fields.name: ear infructescence position ratio
fields.definition: "An ear infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000976) which is the ratio of ear infructescence position (TO:0000683) to plant height (TO:0000207)." [TO:cooperl, TO:Ethan_Johnson]

fields.name: hilum morphology trait
fields.definition: "A seed morphology trait (TO:0000184) which is a quality of a hilum (PO:0020063)." [POC:austin_meier]

fields.name: hilum color
fields.definition: "A hilum morphology trait (TO:0000967) which is the color of a hilum (PO:0020063)." [POC:austin_meier]

fields.name: ear inflorescence morphology trait
fields.definition: "An inflorescence morphology trait (TO:0000373) which is a quality of an ear inflorescence (PO:0020136)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: panicle density
fields.definition: "An inflorescence density (TO:0000800) trait which is a quality of a panicle (PO:0009049)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: inflorescence hairiness
fields.definition: "An inflorescence morphology trait (TO:0000373) which is the presence or absence of hairs on an inflorescence (PO:0009049)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: spikelet rachilla length
fields.definition: "An inflorescence branch morphology trait (TO:0000784) which is the length of a spikelet rachilla (PO:0009080)." [TO:Ethan_Johnson]

fields.name: spikelet rachilla shape
fields.definition: "An inflorescence branch morphology trait (TO:0000784) which is the shape of a spikelet rachilla (PO:0009080)." [TO:Ethan_Johnson]

fields.name: spikelet rachilla hair type
fields.definition: "An inflorescence branch morphology trait (TO:0000784) which is the pubescence of a spikelet rachilla (PO:0009080)." [TO:Ethan_Johnson]

fields.name: grain width
fields.definition: "A fruit width (TO:0002627) which is  the variation in the width of a grain (PO:0009001)." [TO:austin_meier]

fields.name: ear infructescence morphology trait
fields.definition: "An infructescence morphology trait (TO:0000920) which is a quality of the ear infructescence (PO:0025597)." [TO:Ethan_Johnson]

fields.name: leaf foliage rating
fields.definition: "A leaf size trait (TO:0002637) which is the size of the total surface of a leaf (PO:0025034)." [TO:Ethan_Johnson]
fields.comment: Comment: rating scale of  3, small; 5, intermediate; 7 large

fields.name: glume shape
fields.definition: "A glume morphology trait (TO:0000869) with is the shape of a glume (PO:0009039)." [TO:Ethan_Johnson]

fields.name: involucre morphology trait
fields.definition: "A collective phyllome structure morphology trait (TO:0000845) that is a quality of an involucre (PO:0009100)." [TO:Ethan_Johnson]

fields.name: plant embryo cotyledon color
fields.definition: "A plant embryo cotyledon morphology trait (TO:0000775) which is the color of the plant embryo cotyledon (PO:0025470)." [PATO:0000014]

fields.name: root system morphology trait
fields.definition: "A collective plant organ structure morphology trait (TO:0000842) which is a quality of a root system (PO:0025025)." [PO:0025025] {created_by="ethan_johnson"}

fields.name: staminate flower number trait
fields.definition: "A flower number trait (TO:0002736) which is the number of staminate flowers (PO:0025600)." []

fields.name: pistillate flower number trait
fields.definition: "A flower number trait (TO:0002736) which is the number of pistillate flowers (PO:0025599)." []

fields.name: shoot-borne shoot system morphology trait
fields.definition: "A shoot system morphology trait (TO:0000077) that is a quality of a shoot-borne shoot system (PO:0004545)." []

fields.name: epicormic shoot system morphology trait
fields.definition: "A shoot-borne shoot system morphology trait (TO:0000988) that is a quality of an epicormic shoot system (PO:0004546)." []

fields.name: seed hardness
fields.definition: "A seed morphology trait (TO:0000184) which is the hardness of a seed (PO:0009010)." []

fields.name: epicormic shoot system number
fields.definition: "An epicormic shoot system morphology trait (TO:0000989) which is the number of epicormic shoot systems (PO:0004546)." []

fields.name: gibberellin biosynthesis trait
fields.definition: "A biological process trait (TO:0000283) which is a quality of a gibberellin biosynthetic process (GO:0009686)." []
fields.comment: Refers to gibberellin (CHEBI:24250)

fields.name: cellulose content
fields.definition: "A carbohydrate content trait (TO:0000291) which is the amount of cellulose (CHEBI:62968) in a plant structure (PO:0009011)." [TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refers to crystalline cellulose (CHEBI:62968): A (1→4)-β-D-glucan (cellulose) in crystalline form with a structure consisting of several hundred to over ten thousand D-glucose residues joined by β(1→4) glycosidic linkages.

fields.name: androecium morphology trait
fields.definition: "A collective phyllome structure morphology trait (TO:0000845) that is a quality of the androecium (PO:0009061)." [PO:0009061, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: glume cover
fields.definition: "A glume morphology trait (TO:0000869) which is amount the glume (PO:0009039) covers the caryopsis. Often measured as percentage." [GR:pj, PO:0009039, TO:moorel]

fields.name: glume persistence
fields.definition: "A glume morphology trait (TO:0000869) which is the persistence of a glume (PO:0009039)." [GR:pj, PO:0009039, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Measured as percentage of kernels or seeds carrying the glume after threshing. In a normal setup the seeds do not have glumes after the threshing process.\nRefer to persistence (PATO:0000082): A rhythm quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the repetitiveness of bearer's rhythm.

fields.name: inflorescence exsertion
fields.definition: "An inflorescence morphology trait (TO:0000373) which is the exsertion of an inflorescence (PO:0009049)." [PO:0009049, TO:moorel]

fields.name: plant height uniformity
fields.definition: "A visual estimate of the plant height for a group of plants in an experiment." [GR:pj]

fields.name: basal tiller number
fields.definition: "Number of basal tillers per plant, should represent most plants within a study." [GR:pj]

fields.name: basal tiller length
fields.definition: "The height of the tallest basal tiller (basal axillary shoot) of a plant." [GR:pj]

fields.name: adventitious root number
fields.definition: "Average sum of number of adventitious roots in a plant derived per experiment." [GR:pj]

fields.name: coleoptile length
fields.definition: "A coleoptile morphology trait (TO:0000753) which is the length of a coleoptile (PO:0020033)." [GR:pj, PO:0020033, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: days to flag leaf emergence
fields.definition: "In grass plants the number of days required for the full emergence of the flag leaf in a field or study. It can be counted from date of seed sowing or the transplant (in case of rice)." [GR:pj]

fields.name: deep root number
fields.definition: "A count of number of roots present below a given depth from the soil surface." [GR:pj]

fields.name: senesced leaf number
fields.definition: "Number of leaves in a plant that have undergone leaf senescence stage or are considered dead." [GR:pj]

fields.name: deep root weight ratio
fields.definition: "A ration of the deep root dry weight to total root dry weight per plant." [GR:pj]

fields.name: lateral root length
fields.definition: "A root length (TO:0000227) that is the length of one or more lateral roots (PO:0020121)." [GR:pj, TO:austin_meier, TO:seymour_megan]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: lateral root number
fields.definition: "Average sum of number of lateral roots in a plant derived per experiment." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf dry weight
fields.definition: "A leaf weight trait (TO:0000505) which is the dry weight of a leaf (PO:0025034)." [GR:pj, PO:0025034, TO:moorel]

fields.name: photosynthetic rate
fields.definition: "The total amount of carbon fixed by the plant per unit time and is measured by determining the changes in CO2 concentration over a plant leaf in a glass enclosure." [GR:pj]

fields.name: relative chlorophyll content
fields.definition: "The relative chlorophyll content of the plant determined after a given treatment as compared to the one determined under normal conditions." [GR:pj]

fields.name: water use efficiency
fields.definition: "As determined by the ratio of photosynthetic rate to transpiration rate." [GR:pj]

fields.name: transpiration rate
fields.definition: "The rate of  transpiration." [GR:pj]

fields.name: root to total biomass ratio
fields.definition: "A ratio of root dry weight to total plant dry weight." [GR:pj]

fields.name: exudate sap volume
fields.definition: "Volume of the sap exudate collected from the cut parts of a plant." [GR:pj]

fields.name: days to inflorescence exsertion
fields.definition: "Number of days required for the emergence of inflorescence to become visible on the plant." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Often in grasses it emerges from the flag leaf whcih is the top most leaft on the shoot.

fields.name: days to tassel emergence
fields.definition: "Number of days required for the tassel to emerge from the flag leaf in a maize plant or a group of plants in a study." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Often determined when the 50% length of the tassel has emerged as compared to its full length. Number of days is calculated from the day of sowing of the seeds.

fields.name: days to ear shoot emergence
fields.definition: "Number of days required for the ear shoot to emerge from the given leaf sheath in a maize plant or a group of plants in a study." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Often determined when the 50% length of the ear has emerged as compared to its full length. Number of days is calculated from the day of sowing of the seeds.

fields.name: phosphorus content
fields.definition: "A mineral and ion content trait (TO:0000465) which is the amount of phosphorous (CHEBI:28659) in a plant structure (PO:0009011)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: leaf phosphorus content
fields.definition: "Amount of phosphorus in the leaf." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Often measured in per unit dry weight.

fields.name: respiration rate
fields.definition: "The total amount of carbon lost metabolically by the plant per unit time and is measured by determining the increase in CO2 concentration over a plant leaf in a glass enclosure." [GR:pj]

fields.name: net photosynthetic rate
fields.definition: "It is measured as the difference between gross photosynthesis (the total amount of carbon fixed by the plant per unit time) and the respiration (the total amount of carbon lost metabolically during that same time)." [GR:pj]

fields.name: osmotic adjustment break point
fields.definition: "Break point of leaf water potential in the regression of leaf water potential against leaf relative water content." [CIRAD:Brigitte_Courtois]

fields.name: relative harvest index
fields.definition: "It is a ratio of harvest index in stress to that of control environment." [GR:pj]

fields.name: relative leaf area
fields.definition: "It is a ratio of leaf area determined from a stressed plant to that grown in normal environment." [GR:pj]

fields.name: relative leaf dry weight
fields.definition: "It is a ratio of leaf dry weight determined from a stressed plant to that grown in normal environment." [GR:pj]

fields.name: relative panicle number
fields.definition: "A panicle number (TO:0000152) trait which is the ratio of panicle number determined from a stressed plant to that grown in normal environment." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]

fields.name: relative spikelet number
fields.definition: "It is a ratio of spikelet number per panicle/inflorescence determined from a stressed plant to that grown in normal environment." [GR:pj]

fields.name: relative plant height
fields.definition: "It is a ratio of the plant height determined from a stressed plant to that grown in normal environment." [GR:pj]

fields.name: stem width
fields.definition: "A stem morphology trait (TO:0000361) which is the width of a stem (PO:0009047)." [GR:cwt, PO:0009047, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to width (PATO:0000921): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance from one side of an object to another side which is opposite.

fields.name: root yield
fields.definition: "A yield trait (TO:0000371) which is the yield of roots (PO:0009005)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: root quality trait
fields.definition: "A quality trait (TO:0000597) which is the quality of roots (PO:0009005)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: floral organ size
fields.definition: "A floral organ morphology trait (TO:0000862) which is the size of a floral organ (PO:0025395)." [GR:pj, PO:0025395, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude.

fields.name: stamen size
fields.definition: "A stamen morphology trait (TO:0000225) which is the size of a stamen (PO:0009029)." [GR:pj, PO:0009029, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude. Size categories ranging from small to medium to large.

fields.name: pistil size
fields.definition: "A pistil morphology trait (TO:0000223) which is the size of a pistil." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude.

fields.name: petal size
fields.definition: "A petal morphology trait (TO:0000863) which is the size of a petal (PO:0009032)." [GR:pj, PO:0009032, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude. Size categories ranging from small to medium to large.

fields.name: sepal size
fields.definition: "A sepal morphology trait (TO:0000864) which is the size of a sepal (PO:0009031)." [GR:pj, PO:0009031, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude. Size categories ranging from small to medium to large.

fields.name: petal length
fields.definition: "A petal morphology trait (TO:0000863) which is the length of a petal (PO:0009032)." [GR:pj, PO:0009032, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: petal width
fields.definition: "A petal morphology trait (TO:0000863) which is the width of a petal (PO:0009032) in a flower (PO:0009049)." [GR:pj, PO:0009032, PO:0009049, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to width (PATO:0000921): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance from one side of an object to another side which is opposite.

fields.name: sepal length
fields.definition: "A sepal morphology trait (TO:0000864) which is the length of a sepal (PO:0009031)." [GR:pj, PO:0009031, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: sepal width
fields.definition: "A sepal morphology trait (TO:0000864) which is the width of a sepal (PO:0009031) in a flower (PO:0009049)." [GR:pj, PO:0009031, PO:0009049, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to width (PATO:0000921): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance from one side of an object to another side which is opposite.

fields.name: stamen length
fields.definition: "A stamen morphology trait (TO:0000215) which is the length of a stamen (PO:0009029)." [GR:pj, PO:0009029, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: pistil length
fields.definition: "A pistil morphology trait (TO:0000223) which is the length of a pistil." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: homeotic development trait
fields.definition: "A developmental trait resulting development of increased, decreased or new organs and organ parts due to a mutation that causes one member of a repetitive series to assume the identity of another member , for example, the transformation of sepals into petals." [GR:pj]

fields.name: vegetative homeotic development trait
fields.definition: "A developmental trait resulting development of increased, decreased or new vegetative organs and organ parts due to a mutation that causes one member of a repetitive series to assume the identity of another member , for example, the transformation of leaves into scales." [GR:pj]

fields.name: reproductive homeotic development trait
fields.definition: "A developmental trait resulting development of increased, decreased or new reproductive organs and organ parts due to a mutation that causes one member of a repetitive series to assume the identity of another member , for example, the transformation of sepals into petals." [GR:pj]

fields.name: floral organ length
fields.definition: "A floral organ morphology trait (TO:0000862) which is the length of a floral organ (PO:0025395)." [GR:pj, PO:0025395, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: floral organ width
fields.definition: "A floral organ morphology trait (TO:0000862) which is the width of a floral organ (PO:0025395)." [GR:pj, PO:0025395, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to width (PATO:0000921): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance from one side of an object to another side which is opposite.

fields.name: flowering time trait
fields.definition: "A plant phenological trait (TO:0000933) which is a quality of the timing of anthesis (flowering stage; PO:0007616)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Often influenced by the environment that includes, day light, temperature and geographic location.

fields.name: fruit color
fields.definition: "A fruit morphology trait (TO:0002617) which is the color of a fruit (PO:0009001)." [GR:pj, PO:0009001, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color PATO:0000014: A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: endocarp color
fields.definition: "An endocarp morphology trait (TO:0000946) which is a the color of an endocarp (PO:0009084)." [TO:austin_meier]

fields.name: mesocarp color
fields.definition: "A mesocarp morphology trait (TO:0000948) which is the color of a mesocarp (PO:0009087)." [TO:austin_meier, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: exocarp color
fields.definition: "An exocarp morphology trait (TO:0000906) which is the color of an exocarp (PO:0009085)." [TO:austin_meier, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: fruit columella color
fields.definition: "A fruit color trait (TO:0002617) which is the color of a fruit columella (PO:0004540)." [PO:0004540, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color PATO:0000014: A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: locular tissue trait
fields.definition: "The traits observed for the locular tissue present around the seeds as found in Solanaceae." [SGN:nm]
fields.comment: The values observed in tomato and pepper fruits may be defined differently.

fields.name: pericarp texture
fields.definition: "A pericarp morphology trait (TO:0000945) that is the texture of the pericarp (PO:0009084)." [TO:cooperl]

fields.name: exocarp texture
fields.definition: "An exocarp morphology trait (TO:0000906) that is the texture of the exocarp (PO:0009085)." [TO:austin_meier, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: fruit size
fields.definition: "A fruit morphology trait (TO:0002629) which is the size of a fruit (PO:0009001)." [GR:pj, PO:0009001, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude. Size categories ranging from small to medium to large.

fields.name: fruit length
fields.definition: "A fruit morphology trait (TO:0002629) which is the length of a fruit (PO:0009001)." [GR:pj, PO:0009001, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: fruit width
fields.definition: "A fruit morphology trait (TO:0002629) which is the width of a fruit (PO:0009001)." [GR:pj, PO:0009001, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to width PATO:0000921: A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance from one side of an object to another side which is opposite.

fields.name: fruit shape
fields.definition: "A fruit morphology trait (TO:0002629) which is the shape of a fruit (PO:0009001)." [GR:pj, PO:0009001, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to shape (PATO:0000052): A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's ratios of distances between its features (points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc).

fields.name: fruit morphology trait
fields.definition: "A multi-tissue plant structure morphology trait (TO:0000836) which is a quality of a fruit (PO:0009001)." [GR:pj, PO:0009001, TO:moorel]

fields.name: fruit distal end shape
fields.definition: "A fruit shape (TO:0002628) which is the shape of a fruit distal end (PO:0008001)." [GR:pj, PO:0008001, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to shape (PATO:0000052): A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's ratios of distances between its features (points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc).

fields.name: fruit proximal end shape
fields.definition: "A fruit shape (TO:0002628) which is the shape of the fruit proximal end (PO:0008002)." [GR:pj, PO:0008002, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to shape (PATO:0000052): A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's ratios of distances between its features (points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc).

fields.name: fruit abscission zone size
fields.definition: "A fruit morphology trait (TO:0002632) which is the size of the fruit abscission zone (PO:0006503)." [GR:pj, PO:0006503, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude. Size categories ranging from small to medium to large.

fields.name: fruit ripening trait
fields.definition: "A fruit growth and development trait (TO:0000929) that is the extent of fruit ripening (GO:0009835)." [GR:pj, TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Fruit ripening (GO:0009835) is an aging process that has as participant a fruit. Ripening causes changes in one or more characteristics of a fruit (color, aroma, flavor, texture, hardness, cell wall structure) and may make it more attractive to animals and aid in seed dispersal.

fields.name: fruit firmness
fields.definition: "In addition to the fruit color, firmness is the best measurement of ripeness. It is assayed as the force necessary to break the flesh tissues and depends on the different growth stages during the ripening process." [BR:pj]

fields.name: leaf margin morphology trait
fields.definition: "A phyllome margin morphology trait (TO:0000834) which is a quality of a leaf margin (PO:0020128)." [GR:pj, PO:0020128]
fields.comment: Often associated with leaf margin curvature.

fields.name: leaflet number
fields.definition: "An assay to detrmine the variation the number of leaves." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf size
fields.definition: "A leaf morphology trait (TO:0000748) which is the size of a leaf (PO:0025034)." [GR:pj, PO:0025034, TO:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude. If you are annotating to this term, please add an additional annotation to vascular leaf morphology (TO:0000419) or non-vascular leaf morphology trait (TO:0000925), depending on the species.

fields.name: shoot meristem development
fields.definition: "An assay to associate observing effects on the development of shoot meristem." [GR:pj]

fields.name: acid detergent fiber
fields.definition: "The percentage of highly indigestible or slowly digestible fiber in a feed or forage. Acid detergent fiber contains cellulose as well as silica and lignin which are associated with low digestibility." [GR:pj, GrainGenes_trait:Acid_Detergent_Fiber, web:http\://www.foragetesting.org/lab_procedure/sectionB/4/part4.1.htm]
fields.comment: The method typically uses acidified quaternary detergent solution to dissolve cell solubles, hemicellulose and soluble minerals leaving a residue of cellulose, lignin, and heat damaged protein and a portion of cell wall protein and minerals (ash). Acid detergent fiber is determined gravimetrically as the residue remaining after extraction. The lower the acid detergent fiber, the more digestible the feed is and the higher the energy value of the feed.

fields.name: dietary fiber related trait
fields.definition: "The traits assayed for content and quality of food/forage based on pre or post digestive processes." [GR:pj]

fields.name: carbon isotope discrimination
fields.definition: "It is a measure of the C isotopic composition in plant material relative to the value of the same ratio in the air of the environment where the plant is grown." [GR:pj, GrainGenes_trait:Carbon_isotope_discrimination, PMID:11756262]

fields.name: dry matter digestibility
fields.definition: "Expressed as a percent, is a measure of the dry matter content of forage or feed that is retained in the animal body." [GR:iyt, GR:pj, GrainGenes_trait:Dry_matter_digestibility]

fields.name: malt tenderness
fields.definition: "Percentage of soft malt, measured from micro malting 50g of barley." [GrainGenes_trait:Malt_tenderness, PMID:12677407]

fields.name: flour particle size
fields.definition: "Size of flour particles determined after grinding the grains. The size depends on the length and type of grinding." [GR:pj, GrainGenes_trait:Particle_size]
fields.comment: It affects the water absorption, dough handling characteristics and loaf volume while cooking.

fields.name: starch digestibility
fields.definition: "Expressed as a percent, is a measure of the starch content of forage or feed that is retained in the animal body." [GR:pj, GrainGenes_trait:Starch_digestibility]

fields.name: water absorption by seed
fields.definition: "A measure of the relative water absorption after soaking a known amount (weight) of seed." [GR:pj, GrainGenes_trait:Water_absorption]

fields.name: pesticide sensitivity
fields.definition: "A chemical stress sensitivity (TO:0000482) which is the tolerance exhibited by a plant or a group of plants (population) towards the applied pesticide." [POC:Cooperl]

fields.name: phototropism
fields.definition: "The movement of a plant or plant part in the direction of the light." [GR:pj]

fields.name: shoot phototropism
fields.definition: "Movement of the shoot part of a plant in the direction of the light." [GR:pj, PMID:15598797]

fields.name: root phototropism
fields.definition: "Movement of the shoot part of a plant in the direction of the light." [GR:pj, PMID:15598797]

fields.name: endosperm storage protein content
fields.definition: "Assay for the amount of seed storage protein present in the endosperm." [GR:pj]

fields.name: pyruvate orthophosphate dikinase activity trait
fields.definition: "Catalysis of the reaction: ATP + pyruvate + phosphate = AMP + phosphoenolpyruvate + diphosphate." [EC:2.7.9.1, GO:GO\:0050242, GR:pj]

fields.name: starch grain size
fields.definition: "Assay to determine the size of the starch grain size." [GR:pj]

fields.name: starch grain shape
fields.definition: "Assay to determine the shape of the starch grain." [GR:pj]

fields.name: oxidative stress
fields.definition: "A chemical stress sensitivity (TO:0000482) which is the production of reactive oxygen and the plants ability to readily detoxify the reactive intermediates." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]

fields.name: starch grain synthesis
fields.definition: "An assay to determine if the starch grains are formed in the plant or plant part. Often associated with the starch biosynthesis and branching of the starch." [GR:pj]

fields.name: pistil number
fields.definition: "A pistil morphology trait (TO:0000223) which is the number of pistils in the gynoecium (PO:0009062)." [GR:pj, PO:0009062, TO:moorel]

fields.name: cytokinin content
fields.definition: "Measures the cytokinin content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: seed maturation
fields.definition: "This trait can be derived based on the parameters like, degree of grain filling, grain hardness, hull color, grain moisture, etc. It can be determined for (a)synchronously with any of these parameters." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf rolling tolerance
fields.definition: "A leaf rolling trait (TO:0000085) which is the tolerance for leaf rolling or wilting observed in response to stresses like drought, water and temperature. It precedes leaf drying stage." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]

fields.name: leaf necrosis tolerance
fields.definition: "Tolerance for leaf necrosis or scorching observed in response to stresses like drought, insecticides and cold temperature as evidenced by less number or chlorotic and/or necrotic tissue." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf yellowing tolerance
fields.definition: "Tolerance for leaf color yellowing observed in response to stresses like drought, water and temperature. It may precedes leaf drying stage." [GR:pj]

fields.name: root hair length
fields.definition: "Average maximum length of the root hair present in the root of a plant in a study." [GR:pj]

fields.name: seed phosphorus content
fields.definition: "Amount of phosphorus in the seed." [GR:pj]

fields.name: abscisic acid content
fields.definition: "Measures the abscisic acid content in a plant or plant part." [CHEBI:62431]

fields.name: jasmonic acid content
fields.definition: "Measures the jasmonic acid content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj, PMID:17031029]

fields.name: diterpenoid phytoalexin content
fields.definition: "Measures the diterpenoid phytoalexin content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Diterpenoid phytoalexins are polycyclic diterpenes involved in pathogen response.

fields.name: momilactone A content
fields.definition: "Measures the momilactone A content in a plant or plant part." [PMID:16569039]
fields.comment: Momilactone A is a instance of diterpenoid phytoalexin.

fields.name: momilactone B content
fields.definition: "Measures the momilactone A content in a plant or plant part." [PMID:16569039]
fields.comment: Momilactone B is a instance of diterpenoid phytoalexin.

fields.name: auxin content
fields.definition: "A growth hormone content (TO:0000476) which is the amount of auxin (CHEBI:22676) in a plant structure (PO:0009011)." [GR:pj, PMID:16908506]
fields.comment: The most important auxin produced by plants is indole-3-acetic acid (IAA).

fields.name: amino acid content
fields.definition: "The amino acid content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: tryptophan content
fields.definition: "Amino acid tryptophan content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: gibberellic acid content
fields.definition: "Measures the gibberellic acid content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: brassinosteroid content
fields.definition: "Measures the brassinosteroid content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Brassinosteroids (BR) are a group of steroidal plant hormones.

fields.name: brassinosteroid sensitivity
fields.definition: "Response with respect to application of Brassinosteroid." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Brassinosteroids (BR) are a group of steroidal plant hormones.

fields.name: panicleless
fields.definition: "A panicle number (TO:0000152) trait which is the absence of panicle in the plant, either due to the abortion of the developmental process and/or due to environmental factors." [GR:pj, TO:moorel]

fields.name: inflorescenceless
fields.definition: "The absence of inflorescence in the plant, either due to the abortion of the inflorescence developmental process and/or due to environmental factors." [GR:pj]

fields.name: albumin content
fields.definition: "Assay to determine the amount of albumin protein." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf curling
fields.definition: "An assay to measure the extent of curling of the leaf lamina." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: This is due to the changes in the leaf developmental process and is different from the leaf rolling (TO:0000085) observed due to the water deficient or dorught linke conditions.

fields.name: plant cell shape
fields.definition: "A plant cell morphology trait (TO:0002683) which is the shape of a plant cell (PO:0009002) type." [GR:pj, PO:0009002, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to shape PATO:0000052: A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's ratios of distances between its features (points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc).

fields.name: plant cell morphology trait
fields.definition: "A plant structure morphology trait (TO:0000839) which is a quality of a plant cell (PO:0009002)." [GR:pj, PO:0009002, TO:moorel]

fields.name: plant cell size
fields.definition: "A plant cell morphology trait (TO:0002683) which is the size of a plant cell (PO:0009002) type." [GR:pj, PO:0009002, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude.

fields.name: crown root number
fields.definition: "A count of number of crown roots present in the seedling." [GR:pj]

fields.name: cell growth and development trait
fields.definition: "Traits associated with observing effects on the growth and development of the plant cell and its parts." [GR:pj]

fields.name: cell elongation trait
fields.definition: "An assay to determine the variation in the length of the plant cell due to cell growth and elongation." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf lamina joint bending
fields.definition: "A leaf lamina morphology trait (TO:0000829) which is the extent of the bending that occurrs to the leaf lamina (PO:0020039) joint in degrees." [GR:pj, PMID:14615594, PO:0020039, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: It may happen due to environmental stress such as upon brassinosteroid treatment.

fields.name: leaf sheath length
fields.definition: "A leaf sheath morphology trait (TO:0000835) which is the length of the leaf sheath (PO:0020104)." [GR:pj, PO:0020104, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points. Usually measured in in centimeters.

fields.name: leaf lamina length
fields.definition: "A leaf lamina morphology trait (TO:0000829) which is the length of the leaf laimina (PO:0020039)." [GR:pj, PO:0020039, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points. Usually measured in centimeters.

fields.name: peduncle length
fields.definition: "A peduncle morphology trait (TO:0000776) which is the length of a peduncle (PO:0009053)." [GR:pj, PO:0009053, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Peduncle is the stalk of an inflorescence; that part of the inflorescence below the first flower or inflorescence branch and above the last foliage leaf/pair of foliage leaves.\nRefers to the length ((PATO:0000122):A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points) of a peduncle (PO:0009053).

fields.name: root meristem development
fields.definition: "An assay to determine the variation in the root meristem development." [GR:pj, PMID:17303594]
fields.comment: The variation may be due to both the genotypic and/or environmental effects.

fields.name: gravity response trait
fields.definition: "An assay to determine the variation in the gravitropism under the influence of gravity or zero gravity." [GR:pj]

fields.name: fruit flavor trait
fields.definition: "An assay to determine the sensory impression of a fruit by the chemical senses of taste and smell." [GR:pj]

fields.name: beta-carotene content
fields.definition: "The beta-carotene content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: The most common form of carotenoid is beta-carotene.

fields.name: alpha carotene content
fields.definition: "The alpha-carotene content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: The alpha-carotene is the second most common form of carotenoid.

fields.name: cyclic carotene content
fields.definition: "The cyclic carotene content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: acyclic carotene content
fields.definition: "The acyclic carotene content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: lycopene content
fields.definition: "The lycopene content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Lycopene is the most efficient quencher of singlet oxygen free radicals.

fields.name: pungency
fields.definition: "The quality of producing a sharp sensation of taste or smell." [GR:pj]

fields.name: lutein content
fields.definition: "The leutein content in a plant or plant part." [GR:pj]

fields.name: cercospora leaf spot resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Cercospora spp." [GR:pj]

fields.name: protist disease resistance
fields.definition: "The resistance exhibited by a plant or a group of plants (population) in response to the disease caused by a protist infection as compared to the susceptible and/or the reference plants of the same species." [GR:pj]

fields.name: Meloidogyne incognita resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Meloidogyne incognita. Symptom: resistant to damage caused by the pathogen Meloidogyne incognita (root knot nematode). It  produces characteristic galls (swellings) on roots." [GR:pj]

fields.name: cucurbit downy mildew resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Pseudoperonospora cubensis. It causes the downy mildew disease in cucurbits." [GR:pj]

fields.name: awn morphology trait

Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points. Refer to size (PATO:0000117): A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical magnitude. Size categories ranging from small to medium to large.

fields.name: awn presence

fields.comment: Refer to presence value PATO:0000458.

fields.name: straighthead
fields.definition: "Malformed inflorescence (panicle in rice), by staying upright/straight at the time of maturity and may carry infertile seeds." [GR:pj, web:http\://plantpathology.tamu.edu/Texlab/Grains/Rice/rices.html]
fields.comment: For rice: Straighthead is a physiological disorder that causes the entire head to be blank and remain upright at maturity in rice. Straighthead generally occurs in spots scattered throughout a field and is most easily recognized near harvest when normal plants have downturned heads (from the weight of the grain in the panicle). The disease is frequently found on sandy loam soils but seldom on clay soils. Old cotton fields with arsenic residues can have a severe incidence of straighthead. Other, as yet unknown, soil factors are also involved in causing straighthead. Often it is found in fields where excessive non-decayed vegetation has been plowed under just before planting. The disease is characterized by upright heads when the rice matures due to infertile seed. Hulls may be distorted into a crescent shape or "parrot beak". One or both hulls may be missing. Affected plants continue to grow, are a darker green, and often produce shoots from a lower portion of the plant. First year crops of rice grown on "new ground" are more likely to be affected. Some varieties are more tolerant than others. Control measures include planting resistant varieties and draining fields with a history of the disorder just prior to internode elongation.

fields.name: floret number per inflorescence

fields.name: fruit surface area

fields.comment: Refer to volume (PATO:0000918): A 3-D extent quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's amount of 3-dimensional space it occupies.

fields.name: ligule margin pubescence

fields.name: cell organelle development trait

fields.name: volume of grain with hull

fields.name: ligule margin shape

fields.name: linoleic acid content
fields.definition: "The linoleic acid content in the essential oils present in or extracted from a plant or the plant part such as seed." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: According to the Codex Alimentarium, the FAO international standards for food product specifications, the normal values may differ depending on the source plant. For example, in soybean oil the normal values for linoleic acid content are 48% - 59%.

fields.name: oleic acid content
fields.definition: "The oleic acid content in the essential oils present in or extracted from a plant or the plant part such as seed." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: According to the Codex Alimentarium, the FAO international standards for food product specifications, the normal values may differ depending on the source plant. For example, for soybean oil the normal values for oleic acid content are 17% - 30%.

fields.name: stearic acid content
fields.definition: "The stearic acid content in the essential oils present in or extracted from a plant or the plant part such as seed." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: According to the Codex Alimentarium, the FAO international standards for food product specifications, the normal values may differ depending on the source plant. e.g. for soybean oil the normal values for stearic acid content are 2% - 5.4%.

fields.name: omega-3 fatty acid content
fields.definition: "The omega-3 fatty acid content in the essential oils present in or extracted from a plant or the plant part such as seed." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Omega-3 fatty acid (CHEBI:25681)  is a  polyunsaturated fatty acid (CHEBI:26208) . There are four subtypes of omega-3 fatty acids, namely,  alpha-licanic acid (CHEBI:28771), all-cis-docosa-4,7,10,13,16,19-hexaenoic acid (CHEBI:28125), all-cis-icosa-5,8,11,14,17-pentaenoic acid and alpha-linolenic acid (CHEBI:27432).

fields.name: alpha-linolenic acid content
fields.definition: "The alpha-linolenic acid content in the essential oils present in or extracted from a plant or the plant part such as seed." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: According to the Codex Alimentarium, the FAO international standards for food product specifications, the normal values may differ depending on the source plant. For example, in soybean oil the normal values for alpha-linolenic acid content are 4.5% - 11%.

fields.name: glyphosate sensitivity

fields.comment: It is expected that the herbicide application must not affect the agronomic yield, if any.

fields.name: glufosinate sensitivity

fields.comment: It is expected that the herbicide application must not affect the agronomic yield, if any.

fields.name: acetolactate synthase inhibitor sensitivity

fields.comment: It is expected that the herbicide application must not affect the agronomic yield, if any.

fields.name: oligosaccharide content

fields.name: raffinose content

fields.name: phyllotaxy

fields.name: plant tissue development trait

fields.name: meristem tissue development trait

fields.name: meristem identity

fields.name: floral organ identity

fields.name: floral bract development trait

fields.name: glume number

fields.name: boron concentration

fields.name: magnesium concentration

fields.name: phosphorus concentration

fields.name: sulfur concentration

fields.name: calcium concentration
fields.definition: "A mineral and ion content related trait (TO:0000465) which is the concentration of calcium (CHEBI:22985) in some plant structure (PO:0009011)." [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: manganese concentration
fields.definition: "A manganese content (TO:0020091) which is the concentration of manganese (CHEBI:25154) in some plant structure (PO:0009011)" [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: iron concentration
fields.definition: "An iron content (TO:0020089) which is the concentration of iron (CHEBI:24873) in some plant structure (PO:0009011)" [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: cobalt concentration
fields.definition: "A mineral and ion content related trait (TO:0000465) which is the concentration of cobalt (CHEBI:33888) in some plant structure (PO:0009011)." [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: nickel concenteration
fields.definition: "The total Nickel ion concentration measured in a given volume of a plant or a plant part or plant extract." [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: copper concentration
fields.definition: "A copper content (TO:0020092) which is the concentration of copper (CHEBI:23377) in some plant structure (PO:0009011)" [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: zinc concentration
fields.definition: "A zinc content (TO:0020090) which is the concentration of zinc (CHEBI:27364) in some plant structure (PO:0009011)" [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: arsenic concentration
fields.definition: "A mineral and ion content related trait (TO:0000465) which is the concentration of arsenic (CHEBI:22632) in some plant structure (PO:0009011)." [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: selenium concentration
fields.definition: "A mineral and ion content related trait (TO:0000465) which is the concentration of selenium (CHEBI:26628) in some plant structure (PO:0009011)." [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: molybdenum concentration
fields.definition: "A mineral and ion content related trait (TO:0000465) which is the concentration of molybdenum (CHEBI:25370) in some plant structure (PO:0009011)." [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: cuperous ion concentration
fields.definition: "The total Cu2+ ion concentration measured in a given volume of a plant or a plant part or plant extract." [GR:pj]

fields.name: cuperic ion concentration
fields.definition: "The total Cu3+ ion concentration measured in a given volume of a plant or a plant part or plant extract." [GR:pj]

fields.name: cadmium concentration
fields.definition: "A mineral and ion content related trait (TO:0000465) which is the concentration of cadmium (CHEBI:22978) in some plant structure (PO:0009011).\n." [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: leaf chlorosis
fields.definition: "A leaf color trait (TO:0006060) describing the yellowing of leaves, due to insufficient production of chlorophyll." [GR:Karthik, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Leaf surface affected by abiotic stresses like insecticides and cold temperature as evidenced by chlorotic tissue.

fields.name: days to germinate
fields.definition: "Number of days taken from the day of sowing to the first emergence of cotyledons or hypocotyl." [GR:curators]

fields.name: plant width
fields.definition: "The average width of a plant measured across an axis such as the main stem/stalk." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf margin serrated
fields.definition: "A leaf margin morphology trait (TO:0002635) which is a notched or grooved leaf margin (PO:0020128)." [GR:curators, PO:0020128, POC:cooperl]
fields.comment: Refer to serrated (PATO:0001206): A shape quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of having sharp straight-edged teeth pointing to the apex.

fields.name: rolled leaf
fields.definition: "Leaf lamina rolled into a tube like structure." [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: seedling hypocotyl length
fields.definition: "A seedling hypocotyl morphology trait (TO:0000769) which is the length of a seedling hypocotyl (PO:0025291)." [GR:Karthik, PO:0025291, POC:cooperl]

fields.name: leaf trichome density
fields.definition: "Measurement of trichomes found in per unit area of a leaf." [GR:curators]

fields.name: aphid resistance
fields.definition: "Resistance displayed by the plant to the aphid infestation." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: Aphids are members of the insect order Homoptera, family Aphididae.

fields.name: germinability in dark
fields.definition: "Measure of the seed's germination ability in dark." [GR:curators]

fields.name: DSDS50
fields.definition: "A measure of seed dormancy defined as the days of seed dry storage required to reach 50% germination (DSDS50)." [GR:Karthik]

fields.name: percent germination
fields.definition: "The percentage of seeds that germinate against the total number of seeds planted." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf lamina color distribution
fields.definition: "Describes the way different colors, their hue and shades are distributed on a leaf lamina and its parts such as leaf margin, leaf tip, leaf veins." [GR:pj]

fields.name: inflorescence primary branch attitude
fields.definition: "An inflorescence primary branch morphology trait (TO:0000846) which is the attitude of a second order inflorescence axis (PO:0006321) in terms of upright and drooping characters." [GR:pj, PO:0006321, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Associated to the trait inflorescence type (TO:0000267).

fields.name: inflorescence axis color
fields.definition: "An inflorescence axis morphology trait (TO:0000782) which is the color of the inflorescence axis (PO:0020122)." [GR:pj, PO:0020122, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color PATO:0000014: A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: inflorescence branch color
fields.definition: "An inflorescence branch morphology trait (TO:0000784) which is the color of the inflorescence branch (PO:0009081)." [GR:pj, PO:0009081, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to color PATO:0000014: A composite chromatic quality composed of hue, saturation and intensity parts.

fields.name: penultimate leaf length
fields.definition: "Length of the leaf penultimate to the first leaf below the inflorescence." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: In case of cereal crop plants such as rice, corn, wheat etc., first leaf below the inflorescence or the last leaf on the shoot is called the flag leaf. Penultimate leaf is the one below flag leaf.

fields.name: penultimate leaf lamina width
fields.definition: "Lamina width of the leaf penultimate to the first leaf below the inflorescence." [GR:pj]
fields.comment: In case of cereal crop plants such as rice, corn, wheat etc., first leaf below the inflorescence or the last leaf on the shoot is called the flag leaf. Penultimate leaf is the one below flag leaf.

fields.name: awn width
fields.definition: "An awn morphology trait (TO:0002718) which is the width of the awn (PO:0025349)." [GR:pj, PO:0025349, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to width (PATO:0000921): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance from one side of an object to another side which is opposite.

fields.name: stigma length
fields.definition: "A floral organ length (TO:0002614) that is the length of the stigma (PO:0009073)." [GR:pj]

fields.name: style length
fields.definition: "A floral organ length (TO:0002614) that is the length of the style (PO:0009074)." [GR:pj]

fields.name: internode color in proxomity to colored node
fields.definition: "Color of the spatial section of the internode that is found proximal (next) to the colored node of a stem." [GR:pj]

fields.name: leaf area index
fields.definition: "Leaf Area Index (LAI) is the ratio of total upper leaf surface of vegetation divided by the surface area of the land on which the vegetation grows." [Wikipedia:Leaf_area_index]
fields.comment: LAI is used to predict photosynthetic primary production and as a reference tool for crop growth. Measured on the plant canopy only.

fields.name: leaf chlorophyll content
fields.definition: "A chlorophyll content trait (TO:0000495) which is a quality of a leaf (PO:0025034)." [PO:0025034, TO:cooperl]

fields.name: quantum yield determined by the light curve
quantum yield at a given wavelength
leaf area duration
fields.definition: "Leaf Area Duration (LAD) is the ratio of total upper leaf surface of vegetation divided by the surface area of the land on which the vegetation grows. Measured over time." [group:Crop_Ontology_Group]

fields.name: leaf senescence rate
fields.definition: "Rate of loss of normal leaf color over time." [group:Crop_Ontology_Group]

fields.name: leaf senescence duration
fields.definition: "Time taken to lose normal leaf color." [group:Crop_Ontology_Group]
fields.comment: In grasses often measured for flag or the second leaf from top.

fields.name: panicle compactness and shape
fields.definition: "A panicle morphology trait (TO:0000847) which is the compactness and shape of a panicle." [TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to compact (PATO:0001485): A structural quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's being thicker or more closely packed together; pressed tightly together.\nRefer to shape (PATO:0000052): A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's ratios of distances between its features (points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc).

fields.name: grain weight to panicle weight ratio
shoot potassium content
fields.definition: "The percent content of potassium ion measured in the shoots of the plant." [GR:cwt, ICRIS:019]

fields.name: shoot sodium content
fields.definition: "The percent sodium ion content measured in the shoot." [GR:cwt, ICRIS:018]

fields.name: sorghum stem borer resistance
fields.definition: "Causative agent:Chilo partellus. Infections causes the appearance of small elongated holes in young whorl leaves, tunelling of earheads results in breakage or chaffy earheads affecting grain development." [GCP:053, GR:cwt6]

fields.name: sorghum shoot fly resistance
fields.definition: "Causative agent:Atherigona soccata. Larval feeding results in central leaf wilting and drying causing the typical deadheart symptom." [GCP:051, GR:cwt6]

fields.name: sorghum grain mold
fields.definition: "Causative agent: Aspergillus spp and Penicillium spp. Trait is measured as extent of grain surface covered with mold." [GR:cwt, ICRIS:050]

fields.name: sorghum rust resistance
fields.definition: "Causative agent: Puccinia purpurea. Infection causes purple, red or tan flecks on both surfaces of leaves, leaving a reddish powder on fingers when passed over it." [GR:cwt, ICRIS:049]

fields.name: sorghum downy mildew resistance
fields.definition: "Causative agent:Peronospora sp. It causes abundant downy white growth on the under surfaces of infected portions of leaves during humid weather, mature infected leaves become necrotic and intervenal tissues disintegrate to give the typical shredded leaf symptom." [GR:cwt, ICRIS:047]

fields.name: seed texture
fields.definition: "A seed morphology trait (TO:0000184) which is the texture of a seed (PO:0009010)." [PO:0009010, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to texture PATO:0000150: A morphologic quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's relative size, organization and distribution of its surface elements or the representation or invention of the appearance of its surface; visual and tactile surface characteristics.

fields.name: seed coat spotted
fields.definition: "A seed coat pattern trait  (TO:0000904) where the seed coat (PO:0009088) has colored spots." [PO:0009088, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to spotted (PATO:0000333): A color pattern inhering in a bearer by virtue of bearer's being marked with a round area of different hue or degree of saturation.

fields.name: leaf lamina pubscence length
fields.definition: "Length of pubescence (presence of hairs) on the leaf blade surface." [GR:cwt]

fields.name: leaf lamina pubescence density
fields.definition: "Density of pubescence (presence of hairs) on the leaf blade surface." [GR:cwt]

fields.name: leaf lamina margin pubescence length
fields.definition: "A leaf lamina margin pudescence (TO:0002723) trait which is the length of pubescence (presence of hairs) on the leaf lamina margin (PO:0025009)." [GR:cwt, PO:0025009, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to pubescent hair (PATO:0001320): A pilosity quality of being covered with short hairs or soft down. Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: leaf lamina margin pubescence density
fields.definition: "A leaf lamina margin pubescence trait (TO:0002723) which is the density of pubescence (presence of hairs) on the leaf lamina margin (PO:0025009)." [GR:cwt6, PO:002009, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to pubescent hair (PATO:0001320): A pilosity quality of being covered with short hairs or soft down. Refer to density (PATO:0001019): A physical quality which inheres in a bearer by virtue of some influence is exerted by the bearer's mass per unit size.

fields.name: glume length
fields.definition: "A glume morphology trait (TO:0000869) which is the length of a glume (PO:0009039) measured in mm (millimeter)." [GR:cwt, IWIS:1420, PO:0009039, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: glume width
fields.definition: "A glume morphology trait (TO:0000869) with is the measurement of width of glume (PO:0009039) in mm (millimeter)." [GR:cwt, IWIS:1421, PO:0009039, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to width (PATO:0000921): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance from one side of an object to another side which is opposite.

fields.name: glume pubescence density
fields.definition: "A glume pubescence (TO:0020036) trait which is the measurement of glume hairines density on outer side of sterile glume (PO:0009039)." [GR:cwt, IWIS:1422, PO:0009039, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to density (PATO:0001019): A physical quality which inheres in a bearer by virtue of some influence is exerted by the bearer's mass per unit size.

fields.name: glume pubescence
fields.definition: "A glume morphology trait (TO:0000869) which is the extent of pubescence  (presence of hairs)  on the glume (PO:0009039) surface." [GR:cwt, PO:0009039, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to pubescent hair (PATO:0001320): A pilosity quality of being covered with short hairs or soft down.

fields.name: glume pubescence length
fields.definition: "A glume pubescence (TO:0020036) which is the measurement of length of hairs on glume (PO:0009039)." [GR:cwt, IWIS:1423, PO:0009039, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to length (PATO:0000122): A 1-D extent quality which is equal to the distance between two points.

fields.name: glume waxiness
fields.definition: "A glume morphology trait (TO:0000869) which is the presence of wax on a glume (PO:0009039)." [GR:cwt, IWIS:1412, PO:0009039, TO:moorel]
fields.comment: Refer to waxiness (PATO:0002381): A composition quality inhering in an bearer by virtue of the presence of long chain aliphatic lipids on the surface of an organism.

fields.name: barley leaf scald disease resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Rhynchosporium secalis." [T-CAP:Victoria_Corollo_Blake]
fields.comment: Symptoms include, oval, water-soaked, blue-grey spots (1.0-1.5 cm long) developing into lesions with dry necrotic centers and dark brown margins. Lesions will coalesce under high infection levels and are not delimited by veins.

fields.name: barley spot blotch disease resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Cochliobolus sativus (Bipolaris sorokiniana)." [T-CAP:Victoria_Corollo_Blake]
fields.comment: Symptoms include, uniform chocolate brown lesions that eventually merge forming irregular necrotic patches on leaves. Lesions may be surrounded by yellow zones of varying width.

fields.name: wheat spot blotch disease resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Cochliobolus sativus (Bipolaris sorokiniana)." [T-CAP:Victoria_Corollo_Blake]
fields.comment: Symptoms include, elongated to oval shaped dark brown lesions. Centers often lighten to dark brown or tan surrounded by an irregular dark brown ring.

fields.name: barley stripe rust disease resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Puccinia striiformis f. sp. hordei." [T-CAP:Victoria_Corollo_Blake]
fields.comment: Symptoms: chlorotic flecks at the infection site initially appear, followed by yellow uredinia (spore masses) in prominent stripes along the leaf veins. Black telia (overseasoning structures) readily develop from uredinia as infected plants mature.

fields.name: wheat stripe rust disease resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Puccinia striiformis f. sp. tritici." [T-CAP:Victoria_Corollo_Blake]
fields.comment: Symptoms: pustules (spore masses) containing yellow to orange-yellow urediniospores form narrow stripes on leaves, leaf sheaths and glumes.

fields.name: barley leaf rust disease resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Puccinia hordei." [T-CAP:Victoria_Corollo_Blake]
fields.comment: Symptoms: small round orange brown pustules producing a mass of orange-brown urediniospores on the upper leaf surfaces and leaf sheaths.

fields.name: wheat leaf rust disease resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Puccinia recondita f. sp. tritici." [T-CAP:Victoria_Corollo_Blake]
fields.comment: Symptoms: circular to slightly elliptical pustules containing masses of orange to orange-brown urediniospores on the leaf surfaces and leaf sheaths.

fields.name: barley common root rot resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agents: Cochliobolus sativus (Bipolaris sorokiniana), Fusarium culmorum and Fusarium pseudograminearum." [T-CAP:Victoria_Corollo_Blake]
fields.comment: Symptoms: brown lesions on the roots, especially the subcrown internode. Under severe conditions, lesions can become nearly black with brown tissue extending into the crown and leaf sheaths. Stunted plants with reduced tillering and yield. Heads can be white with fewer kernels that are small and shriveled.

fields.name: wheat common root rot resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agents: Cochliobolus sativus (Bipolaris sorokiniana)." [T-CAP:Victoria_Corollo_Blake]
fields.comment: Symptoms: browning of the root, crown and basal culm tissues.  Plants may lodge. White spikes can appear.

fields.name: barley powdery mildew disease resistance
fields.definition: "Causal agent: Blumeria graminis f. sp. hordei." [T-CAP:Victoria_Corollo_Blake]
